All of them study, two in Secondary school and one in Primary school. She is a hard-working woman who has made an effort to get ahead and improve their living conditions. She is a salesperson with lots of experience selling clothing, perfumes and catalog products.

She will invest the loan in buying more merchandise in order to fill all the requests she has from her clients. She has not filled them as she doesn't have enough money to do so. This will permit her to expand her portfolio of clients and increase her income through her sales.

Maríanela with her enthusiasm and desire to work knows that this loan will be a great help to her and her family. It will allow her to get closer to accomplishing her dreams, which are to see her children complete their studies and to improve the conditions of her house.

loans.use: to buy clothing, perfume and items from catalogs for the home.

loans.name: Alfayo

texts.en:
Alfayo is a 48-year-old, married man and a father to five children, aged between 26 and 10 years. He has been in the carpentry business for the last 20 years, making a monthly income of KES 8,000 (Kenya shillings). 

Alfayo is a new member in VisionFund Kenya and he has applied for his first loan, which he plans to use to add more stocks of timber, nails, and glue to make furniture in his stall. He hopes to use the anticipated profits to repay his loan on-time.

In the future, Alfayo would like to have a well-established business and to educate his children to the highest level possible.

loans.use: to add stocks of timber, nails, and glue for his business.

loans.name: Judith Marisol

texts.es:
Judith Marisol tiene 20 años de edad, vive en el sector El Sauce, una zona rural del distrito de Cayalti, es una comunidad pequeña que se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la cría de pavos, que posteriormete lo engorda para fechas navideñas, asi como para ocasiones especiales que son requeridos por sus clientes.

Ha solicitad un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de pavos pequeños y una depósitos para comederos y de esta manera tener un mejor cuidado y ahorro en los alimentos para no desperdiciarlo.
texts.en:
Judith Marisol is 20 years old, and lives in the El Sauce sector, a rural area in the Cayalti district. It is a small community that works in agriculture, trade, and livestock, located in the Chiclayo province which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. 

She works raising turkeys, which afterwards she fattens for Christmas time, as well as for special occasions which are required by her customers. 

She has asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 soles to buy small turkeys and a tank for feeding, and in this way take better care and save on food by not wasting it.

loans.use: to buy small turkeys and a tank for feeding.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, requiere de más capital para comprar abono, herbicidas, plaguicidas, abono y semilla, para cultivar maíz y frijol, de esa manera se mantendrá trabajando en la agricultura para dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
Con el préstamo anterior logro tener una buena cosecha y optimizar la alimentación de su familia, en su núcleo familiar hay un nuevo miembro.
texts.en: Concepción needs more working capital in order to buy herbicide, insecticide, manure, and seeds, which he needs to continue growing sweetcorn and broad beans, an activity that helps him improve his family's standard of living. Thanks to the previous loan, he had a good harvest and managed to feed his family better food. There was a new addition to his family.

loans.use: to buy herbicide, insecticide, manure, and seeds.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Oscar Eduardo

texts.es:
Oscar de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta 8° grado,  debido a que sus padres no contaban  con los recursos económicos necesarios para que él siguiera estudiando. Entones se dedicó a trabajar la agricultura y el comercio. Hace  unos meses decidió casarse, su esposa trabaja como empleada de oficios domésticos  

Oscar se dedica al comercio en la compra y venta de ganado,  empezó a trabajar con un amigo y ahora ya tiene 4 años de dedicarse de forma individual. Anteriormente era ayudante,  con lo que tenía invertido hace 3 meses decidió vender todas las vacas que tenía para obtener dinero para utilizar en los gastos de su boda y en la construcción de una pequeña casa, también se dedica a la agricultura y a la albañilería se tiene que desplazar grandes distancias para ir a comprar ganado y el horario es variable,  pero por lo general de 7 am a 6 pm 

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar 2 terneras y las tendrá en repasto durante un periodo de 3 a 6 meses y luego las venderá y comprara otras. Agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que se le brinda.

Su sueño es poder tener una  pequeña ganadería y darles una vida mejor a sus hijos que muy pronto vendrán en camino, generar unos empleos para otra persona al igual que una vez lo hicieron con él. Con las ganancias que obtenga las invertirá en la compra de más ganado.
texts.en: Oscar is 34 years old. He studied up to the eighth form only, because his parents had no means to keep sending him to school, which is why he became a farmer and a merchant. He married a few months ago, and his wife is a domestic worker. Oscar trades in cattle. At first, he partenered up with a friend, but he has been working alone for four years now, where before he was simply a helper. Three months ago, he sold all the cows he had, all his investment, in order to have ready cash for his wedding and to build a small house. He works as a farmer and a bricklayer. He needs to cover great distances to go to buy cattle. His hours vary, but he usually works from 7 am to 6 pm. He asks Credicampo for a loan so as to buy 2 heifers, which he will keep in a pasture for 3 to 6 months and then resell in order to buy others. He is grateful for the opportunity this loan represents. His dream is to have a small animal farm of his own and to make a better life for the children he will soon have. He wants to create jobs for at least one person, in order to mirror the chance he was once given. He will use the profits to buy more cattle.

loans.use: to buy two heifers to fatten and resell.

loans.name: Lor's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Lor is a 49-year-old married woman. Rice farming has been the only source of income for her family for 28 years. The current business earns her about 26,000 KHR per day. 
Lor has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely repaid the loan. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. Lor wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Tabara's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois est créé le 7 novembre 2013, il est constitué de quarante deux femmes qui sont parentes et habitent le même village.Les principales activités menées sont l'agriculture et le commerce.


Madame Tabara l'emprunteuse vedette est âgée de 20 ans. Elle est jeune mariée sans enfant. Elle mène une activité de petit commerce de poissons frais et de légumes; elle a une expérience de 3 ans dans ce domaine. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite la main levée.


Elle compte avec son prêt acheter du poisson pour une valeur de 40000 F, des légumes ( carottes, navets, aubergines, feuilles d'oseille....) pour 30000 F et 5000 F en produits divers. Elle va revendre dans sa localité.


Tabara est la seule à faire cette activité dans le village et elle pense obtenir beaucoup de revenus.


Elle envisage avec ses bénéfices améliorer ses conditions de vie et son habitat. Et plus tard quand elle aura des enfants, subvenir à leurs besoins.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was established on November 7, 2013. It is made up of 42 women who are relatives and live in the same village. Their main businesses are agriculture and trade.

Mrs. Tabara, age 20, is the featured borrower. She recently married and doesn't have children. She retails fresh fish and vegetables. She has three years of experience in this field. In the photograph, she's the one standing on the right and raising her hand.

She intends to use her loan to buy XOF 40'000 worth of fish, XOF 30'000 worth of vegetables (carrots, turnips, eggplants, sorrel leaves, etc) and XOF 5'000 of various products. She will resell in her village.

Tabara is the only one running this business in the village. She thinks she will turn a good profit. She intends to use her profits to improve her standard of living and her home. And later on, when she will have kids, to take care of them.

loans.use: to buy fish and vegetables

loans.name: Francisco Ulises

texts.es: Francisco tiene 20 años de edad y habita junto a su compañera de vida en casa de su padre la cual recibirá como herencia. Francisco se dedica a la agricultura principalmente al cultivo de mora, espinaca, y güisquiles. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien con mucho esfuerzo lleva el sustento a su hogar. Francisco solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda y para construir una champa. Con el crédito comprará lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en: Francisco is 20 years old and lives with his partner at his father's house, which he will inherit. He is a farmer and grows mainly blackberries, spinach, and chayote. He is a very hard-working man who spares no effort to feed his family. He asks FUSAI for a loan in order to repair the roof of the existing house and build another small house. He will buy materials such as galvanised metal sheets, wood, and nails.

loans.use: to buy materials to repair the roof and build a small house.

loans.name: Fatou's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois qui existe depuis le 30 décembre 2009; il est composé de vingt femmes qui entretiennent de bons liens de voisinage. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Anta l'emprunteuse en vedette est une femme mariée âgée de 50 ans. Elle capitalise une bonne expérience de plus de 20 années dans le commerce. Elle a une boutique chez elle et vend aussi des tissus. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo et a levé la main. 

Son prêt lui servira à renforcer sa boutique en marchandises et acheter des tissus pour revendre; c'est une activité en plein essor à l'approche des fêtes.Elle se fera ainsi beaucoup de bénéfices.


Elle a beaucoup de clients pour les tissus, surtout au niveau de son groupement.


Ses objectifs sont de renforcer sa capacité de commerce et mieux prendre en charge sa famille.
texts.en:
This group is a part of the banc villageois, which has existed since 30 December 2009, and is made up of five women who maintain neighborly ties. The members all work in commerce.

Anta, the featured borrower of the group, is 50 years old and married. She is standing on the right in the photo and has her hand raised. She has 20 years experience in commerce. She runs a shop from her home and also sells fabric.

This loan will serve to reinforce the stock for her shop and to buy fabric to resell. Because a holiday season is approaching, she [expects] a lot of business.

She has many customers to buy her fabric, especially within her group.

Anta's goals are to strengthen her business and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric to resell

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
Notre emprunteur s’appelle Khady, 33 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle s’active dans le petit commerce depuis 3 ans. Son commerce consiste à vendre du café artisanal en poudre non encore préparé appelé « le café Touba », qui est très prisé dans le pays. Elle le met en sachet de 1kilo ou de 500g et fait l’ambulant pour écouler son produit. Elle reçoit des commandes des vendeuses de petit déjeuner et des gargotes. La dame Khady, règle ses besoins à partir de ses bénéfices et participe volontairement à l’amélioration des conditions alimentaires de sa famille.
Elle souhaite un jour ouvrir une boutique de vente de denrées alimentaires.
texts.en: Our borrower, named Khady, is 33 years old and a married mother of two. She has been active in small-scale commerce for three years. Her business involves selling artisanal coffee that is ground but not yet prepared; it is called “Touba coffee” and is highly prized in the country. She packages the coffee in one-kilo or half-kilo bags and goes door to door selling it. She receives special orders from breakfast sellers and from food stalls. Ms. Khady meets her needs with her profits and volontarily helps to improve her family’s living conditions. She wishes one day to open a store selling grocery items.

loans.use: to purchase artisanal coffee to sell

loans.name: Faridah

texts.en:
Faridah lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married, with three children, two of whom go to school. She has one additional family member (sister). 

Faridah sells phone accessories. She operates her business on a retail basis. She works six days a week. She has been in this business for the last three years. 

Faridah has requested a loan of UGX 400,000 (Ugandan shillings) from Micro Credit for Development and Transformation SACCO (MCDT SACCO) to buy  more phone accessories, like chargers, airtime, phone batteries, housings, and covers (jackets). 

Her major business challenges include transportation and defaulters. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully-stocked phone accessories shop and also to become a wholesaler. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but not piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more phone accessories, like chargers, batteries, airtime, housings, and covers (jackets).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy replacement parts to repair his motorcycle.

loans.name: Tuzotunga Group

texts.fr:
Justin  fait partie du groupe  Tuzotunga  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 28 ans et est marié à Joséphine, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants âgés de 2 à 7 ans dont 2   étudient.
Il  a sous sa charge  1 enfant, membre de sa famille élargie,qui  étudie.

Il  fait le commerce de manioc sec  depuis  3 ans. 

C’est son premier crédit   à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande  quantité  de  manioc sec  à revendre, pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Justin is a member of the Tuzotunga group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 28 years old and is married to Joséphine, a merchant. Together they have three children, between two and seven years old. Two of the children go to school. They also take care of one [other] child who is a member of their extended family. This child also goes to school.

Justin has been selling dried manioc for three years. 

This is his first loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital to buy a large quantity of dried manioc, which he will resell to earn more.

loans.use: to buy dried manioc

loans.name: Horimbere Group

texts.fr:
Emmanuel  fait partie du groupe Horimbere  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il  a 57  ans et est marié à Jeanne, une commerçante.Ensemble ils ont 7 enfants ages de 7 à 20 ans tous étudient.

Il fait le commerce de divers produits : du lait, de la limonade, des engrais chimiques,…depuis  9 ans. 

Il est à son huitième crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité du lait, d’engrais chimiques, de limonade,  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années  prochaines, il  voudrait  construire une clôture  de  sa parcelle et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Emmanuel is a member of the Horimbere group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 57 years old and is marred to Jeanne, a merchant. Together they have seven children, between seven and 20 years old. All the children go to school. 

Emmanuel works selling various products--milk, lemonade, chemical fertilizers. He has been doing this for nine years. 

This is his eighth loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, he is going to increase his capital to buy a large quantity of milk, chemical fertilizer, and lemonade, which he will resell to earn more.

In the coming years, Emmanuel would like to build a fence around his land and see his children [continue to] go to school.

loans.use: to buy milk, chemical fertilizer, and lemonade

loans.name: Sabari Kadi Group

texts.fr:
Mme MARCELINE représente le groupe SABARI KADI. Elle se porte bien. Elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 08ans et le moins âgé a 04ans. 01 va à l’école.
Elle vend des habits depuis  plus de 03ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10. 
Elle veut s’acheter 05douzaines d’habits et 06pièces de pagnes.
Mme veut épargner ses  bénéfices. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter, mieux entretenir ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marceline represents Sabari Kadi Group. She is doing well. She's married and the mother of two children. The oldest is eight years old, and the youngest is four. One of them goes to school.

She has been selling clothes for more than three years. She gets her supplies at the market in Sector 10. She wants to buy five dozen sets of clothing and six lengths of pagnes (colorful African cloth).

She wants to saves her profits, and ambitions to open a ready-to-wear store, in order to take better care of her children.

loans.use: to buy 5 dozen sets of clothing and 6 lengths of pagnes (colorful African cloth)

loans.name: Dusangirimizi Group

texts.fr:
Adèle  fait partie du groupe Dusangirimizi et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle a 27 ans et est marié à Michel, un maçon.

Elle  fait le commerce de boutique (haricot, riz, huile de palme,…) depuis  5 ans. 

Elle est à son deuxième   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande  quantité  de haricot, de riz et de l’huile de palme  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années  prochaines, elle  voudrait  devenir une commerçante grossiste et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Adèle is a member of the Dusangirimizi group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 27 years old and is married to Michel, a mason.

Adèle has been in retail (selling beans, rice, palm oil, etc.) for five years. She is on her second loan with Turame. With this Kiva-financed loan, she is going to increase her capital to buy a large quantity of beans, rice, and palm oil, which she will resell to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to become a wholesaler and see her children go to school.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, and palm oil

loans.name: Mariela Del Socorro

texts.es: Mariela es ya una veterana mujer la cual ha sido empleada toda su vida, vive con su esposo y un hijo y se desempeñó toda su vida como confeccionista y paralelamente realizaba por temporada alimentos típicos para maximizar sus ventas, debido a que actualmente no trabaja en la empresa se quiere dedicar de lleno en el mundo de las comidas y por esta razón solicita un crédito para la compra  de utensilios de cocina y materia prima para la elaboración de tamales, morcilla, empanas, pasteles los cuales son comidas típicas del sector, gracias a este préstamo podrá implementar y formalizar su idea de negocio y con la que aspira a tener un buen éxito pues confía en su sazón.
texts.en: Mariela is a woman of a respectable age who was an employee all her life. She lives with her husband and a son. She used to be a seamstress and to prepare traditional seasonal food at home on the side in order to profit a little from the sales. Now that she does not work where she used to anymore, she wants to devote her full attention to her cooking business. She thus asks for a loan in order to buy kitchen utensils and ingredients to prepare tamales, sausages, pasties, and 'pasteles' (Colombian rice tamales), all dishes indigenous to the region. Thanks to this loan, Mariela will be able to turn her modest operation into a real business. She expects success and is confident in her abilities as a cook.

loans.use: to buy utensils and ingredients to prepare the food she sells and turn her modest operation into a real business.

loans.name: Binetou's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe fait partie du Banc Villageois qui existe depuis le 30 décembre 2009; il est composé de vingt sept femmes qui habitent la même localité. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Mame Astou l'emprunteuse en vedette est une femme mariée âgée de 31 ans. Elle est mère de 5 enfants 3 filles et 2 garçons. Elle capitalise une bonne expérience de 5 ans dans le petit commerce. Elle a une table chez elle et vend des produits alimentaires et produits de nettoyage. Elle est debout à droite sur la photo la main levée. 

Son prêt lui servira à acheter du sucre un demi sac à 15000 F, des bonbons deux paquets à 10000 F, du savon deux paquets à 10000 F, de l'amidon pour le linge deux paquets à 10000 F. 


Elle n'a pas de difficultés pour l'écoulement de ses marchandises ce qui lui permet de renouveler plusieurs fois les achats durant le cycle.

Ses bénéfices lui permettent de cotiser à une tontine,d'épargner dans le banc villageois; d'appuyer son mari pour l'alimentation et aussi l'habillement des enfants.
texts.en:
This group is part of the 'banc villageois' which has existed since 30th December 2009.  It is made up of 27 women who all live in the same area, and who all work as retailers.

Mame Astou (standing on the far right, with her hand raised in the photo) is the group respresentative.  She is 31 years old, married and mother to five children, three girls and two boys.  She has at least five years' experience as a retailer.  She sells food and cleaning products from a table set out in her home.  

Mame Astou plans to use her loan to buy a half bag of sugar (for 15,000 francs CFA), two packets of sweets (for 10,000 francs CFA), two packets of soap (for 10,000 francs CFA) and two packets of laundry starch (for 10,000 francs CFA).  

She has no difficulty selling her stock so she will be able to restock several times over the loan period.  Her profits allow her to be part of a tontine, to save money with the 'banc villageois', and help her husband provide for food and clothing for their children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (food and household products) to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, wood, nails, and fine-wire netting.

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer emprendedora, tiene 27 años de edad, es madres soltera y vive en Ica junto a su familia.
Desde hace algunos años se dedica a la venta de periódicos en un puesto que tiene. El ser madre soltera no fue impedimento para que luchara por sus hijas y buscara la manera de brindarles un futuro mejor.
Maria está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un electrodoméstico (una cocina)para que así pueda cocinar de manera segura, ya que la cocina anterior que tenía estaba desgastada. con esto ella podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia y seguirá luchando para cumplir sus sueños: "Tener su propio negocio".
texts.en:
Maria, age 27, is an enterprising woman.  She is a single mother, and she lives in Ica with her family.  She has been selling newspapers at a stand that she has for some years.  Being a single mother was not an impediment to struggling for her daughters and seeking the way to provide them with a better future.

Maria is grateful to the Kiva lenders.  With the support they have provided to her, she will be able to buy a kitchen appliance (a stove).  This way she will be able to cook in a safe way because her old stove was damaged.  With the new one she and her family will be able to have a better quality of life.  She will continue struggling in order to fulfill her dream.  Her dream is to have her own business.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Garukirabakenyezi Group

texts.fr:
Françoise fait partie du groupe Garukirabakenyezi  et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle  a 45  ans et est mariée à Léopold, un mécanicien.

Elle fait le commerce de bière de banane depuis  15 ans. 

Elle est à son vingt-et-unième crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de bananes pour préparer de la bière  à revendre, pour gagner plus.
texts.en: Francoise is a member of the Garukirabakenyezi group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 45 years old and married to Leopold, a mechanic. She has been selling banana beer for 15 years. She is on her 21st loan with Turame. Thanks to the Kiva credit, she will increase her capital and buy a large quantity of bananas to prepare beer for resale, in order to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of bananas so as to prepare beer for resale.

loans.name: Ninziza Group

texts.fr:
Emmanuel  fait partie du groupe Ninziza et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 39  ans et est marié à Espérance, une commerçante.

Il  fait le commerce de boutique de chaussures depuis  20 ans. 

Il est à son deuxième   crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de chaussures  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années  prochaines, il  voudrait  réhabiliter sa maison d’habitation et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Emmanuel is part of the group Ninziza and lives in Bujumbura. He is 39 years old and married to Espérance, a merchant.

Emmanuel has been doing commerce in shoes for twenty years. 

He is on his second Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase many shoes to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to renovate his home and to see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase many shoes to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: María Marta

texts.es:
María de 48 años de edad, no tiene ningún nivel académico ya que ella aprendió de sus hijas que le enseñaron a leer y firmar, ella desarrolla la actividad de oficios domésticos, vive junto a su esposo quien es pescador artesanal y el producto o marisco que pesca ella se encarga de comercializarlo en el mercado municipal, para obtener los ingresos económicos de su familia. 
 
María como antes se ha mencionado conoce muy bien la actividad que desempeña en comercio de mariscos,  ya que lo ejerce desde hace varios años lo que le permitió dar a sus hijas su nivel académico con el cual en la actualidad se desenvuelven en sus labores sin ningún problema,  ya que ellas se encuentran acompañadas pero viven cerca de su vivienda, ya que su esposo es quien pesca el marisco para que ella lo comercialice sin ningún problema dicha actividad la realiza periódicamente aunque depende del resultado de las mareas.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para la reparación del equipo de pesca que ha sufrido un daño en su motor y para comprarle los repuesto y el arreglo.

María tiene como visión mejorar su vivienda, ya que en la actualidad es cubierta con lamina, como también que su esposo obtenga un equipo de pesca en buen estado para realizar una mejor labor.
texts.en: María is 48 and never went to school. Her daughters taught her how to read and sign her name. She takes care of the household while her husband is a small fisherman. She sells the catch (fish or shellfish) at the town market. This is their sole source of income. María is a skilled fishmonger, since she has been in this trade for several years. Thanks to this, her daughters were able to go to school and now have no problems taking care of themselves, since they both live with their respective partners, although close to their parents' house. Her husband's fishing business, and, thus, her sales, depend on the tide. She asks Credicampo for a loan in order to buy replacement parts for the fishing boat's engine and have it repaired. María's dream is to improve her house, which is currently made out of metal sheets, and she also wants her husband to have a working fishing boat and decent implements to help him bring in more catch.

loans.use: para la reparación del equipo de pesca que ha sufrido un daño en su motor y para comprarle los repuesto y el arreglo.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
Cristian es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma, comenta que su meta es recibirse y trabajar en el campo, teniendo  su propia granja donde pueda generar los ingresos para su familia.
Quiere ser un profesional útil a la sociedad, que pueda ayudar a las demás personas que necesiten de él. Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y también poder cubrir sus gastos de transporte.
texts.en:
Cristian is from the city of Caaguazú. He is studying for a degree in agronomy, and tells us that his goal is to finish his degree and work in the countryside with his own farm where he can earn an income to support his family.

Cristian wants to have a profession and be a useful member of society. He also wants to help other people. Cristian is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and transport costs.

loans.use: to pay university fees and transport costs.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de 7 meses de edad. Dora es pequeña comerciante de variedad de zapatos y granos básicos. Su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante desde hace 5 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de zapatos y granos básicos, con el objetivo de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Dora, age 44, is a single mother.  She lives in her own house with her little seven month old daughter.  Dora is a small businesswoman, and she sells a variety of shoes and basic grains.  She has been working in her business in an itinerant manner for five years.  This is the way she earns a living and brings sustenance to her household.

With the desire of improving her living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to invest in her business by purchasing a variety of shoes and basic grains.  Her objective in doing so is to improve her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy a variety of shoes and basic grains for her business.

loans.name: Ntidusigarinyuma Group

texts.fr:
Dieudonné fait partie du groupe Ntidusigarinyuma  et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 38  ans et est marié à Claudette,  une commerçante.

Il  fait le commerce des habits  depuis  10 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d’habits  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années  prochaines, il  voudrait  diversifier ses  activités et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Dieudonné is part of the group Ntidusigarinyuma and lives in Bujumbura. He is 38 years old and married to Claudette, a merchant.

Emmanuel has been doing commerce in clothing for ten years. 

This is his first Turame loan. With the KIVA loan he is obtaining, he is going to increase his capital and purchase a large quantity of clothing to resell, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, he would like to diversify his business and to see his children educated.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of clothing to resell, so as to earn more

loans.name: Nelson Jose

texts.es:
Hace 15 años, Nelson y su esposa necesitaban de un ingreso propio para poder sustentar a su hijo de ese entonces 1 año de edad y al que venía en gestación. Fue entonces cuando decidieron emprender juntos y colocar una pulpería en su hogar. Ahora con 39 años, ya tiene un ingreso estable, pues además de su pulpería vende semillas criollas y productos Avon. Esto le ha ayudado a que sus hijos de 16 y 14 años, no dejen el estudio, ya que él vivió esa experiencia tras dejar su colegio cuando estaba en 4to grado de secundaria. Experiencia la cual no desea que sus hijos pasen. 
Nelson sueña con seguir prosperando, crecer junto a su negocio, para que algún día construir su casa de concreto para brindarle mayor seguridad a su familia. Sin embargo, por el momento necesita seguir invirtiendo en su negocio y para eso necesita de un préstamo para comprar granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, entre otros productos para vender en su pulpería, que le permitirán ofrecer variedad a sus clientes y por ende aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Fifteen years ago Nelson and his wife needed their own income in order to be able to support their child, who was one at the time, and their child that was on its way.  It was then that they decided together to establish a grocery store at their house.

Nelson is now 39 years old, and he has a stable income.  In addition to the grocery store, he sells native seeds and Avon products.  This has helped him to keep his children, ages 16 and 14, in school.  He lived the experience of leaving school when he was in the fourth grade of high school.  This is an experience that he does not want his children to have.

Nelson dreams of continuing to prosper and of growing together with his business.  He wants to do this in order to someday build a house from concrete in order to provide his family with greater security.  Nevertheless, for the moment he needs to continue investing in his business.

In order to do so, he needs a loan to buy basic grains like rice and beans, among other products to sell at his grocery store.  This will allow him to offer his customers variety, which will increase his income.

loans.use: to buy basic grains like rice and beans, among other products

loans.name: Divine Group

texts.fr:
Mr  DAOUDA représente le groupe DIVINE.  Il  se porte bien. Il est célibataire sans enfant. Il a 01 personne en charge. 
Mr  est gérant d’un kiosque depuis 05ans. Il s’approvisionne dans son secteur. 
Il veut s’acheter  01sac de riz, 01 bidon d’huile, 1/2sac de sucre et un carton de nescafé.
Avec ses bénéfices,  il veut renforcer d’avantage  son activité. Il  ambitionne agrandir son kiosque et améliorer sa condition de vie.
texts.en: Mr. DAOUDA represents the group DIVINE. He is doing  fine. An unmarried man without children, he has one person to support. Mr. DAOUDA has been the manager of a kiosk [a stall serving food and drink] for five years. He gets his supplies from his sector. He wants to purchase a bag of rice, a container of oil, a half-bag of sugar, and a box of Nescafé. With his profits, he wants to bolster his business further. His ambition is to expand his kiosk and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase rice, oil, sugar, and a some Nescafé.

loans.name: Wend Pa Gouin Group

texts.fr:
Mme LIZETA est la responsable du groupe WEND PA GUOIN. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 08 enfants. Le plus âgé a 41ans et le moins âgé a 21ans. Personne ne  va à l’école. 
Mme fait de la transformation (dolo « bière de mil »)  depuis 17ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les villages environnants. 
Mme veut s’acheter 04 sacs de 50kg de  mil et 03 rangées de bois.
Elle veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité.  Mme ambitionne toujours étendre les limites  de son activité et aider à scolariser ses petits fils.
texts.en:
Ms. LIZETA is the official of the group WEND PA GUOIN. She is in good health. A married woman, she is the mother of eight children. The oldest is 41 years old, and the youngest is 21. None are in school. 

Ms. LIZETA has been making “dolo” (millet beer) for seventeen years. She gets her supplies from the surrounding villages. 

She wants to purchase four 50-kg sacks of millet and three units of firewood. She wants to reinvest her profits in her business. Her ambition is still to expand her business and help to provide education to her grandchildren.

loans.use: to purchase millet and some firewood

loans.name: Fauto Bladimir

texts.es:
Fauto de 38 años de edad,  estudio hasta 2ª año de bachillerato.  Esta acompañado  y su compañera de vida le apoya con el cuidado de los animales como ganado y pollos, también realiza todos los oficios domésticos del hogar de la cual  tiene un hija de 4 años.

Fauto se dedica al cuidado de ganado del cual compra para repasto y las vende a un mejor precio, el cliente tiene 16 años de dedicarse a esta actividad de compra y venta de ganado experiencia aprendida de su padre quien lo involucro a esta actividad. Él tiene dos vacas paridas de las cuales el producto lo vende para comprar los gastos del hogar y también recibe apoyo de su padres quienes le apoyan con los gastos de la familia.

Fauto sale a comprar el ganado a los pueblos más cercanos de su cantón a una distancia de 6-10 kilómetros lo cual viaja en un carro que el cliente tiene y lo utiliza para jalar los animales que compra, el cliente sale a las 5:00 AM hasta las 12:00 PM.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar una vaca parida y para limpiar los potreros para que los pastos se mejoren para tener el ganado en potreros limpios para una buena sanidad de los animales.  Con este préstamo le permitiera obtener mejores ingresos económicos, ya que tendrá más producción de leche para vender el producto lo cual le permitiera solventar los gastos del hogar y la deuda adquirida en la institución.

Desea crecer económicamente para mantener sus animales en buenas condiciones y este le aporten mayor rentabilidad para sacar adelante su familia  darle los estudios el próximo año a su hija.
texts.en:
Fauto is 38 years old and studied up to his 2nd year of Secondary School. He is in a common-law relationship and his life partner helps him take care of the animals like cattle and chickens. She also does the house work. They have 4 year old daughter.

Fausto raises cattle which he buys, fattens and resells at a higher price. He has 16 years of experience buying and selling cattle which he learned from his father who was also involved in this business. He has two cows that recently gave birth and he sells the product to pay for the household expenses. He also receives support from his parents for these expenses.

Fauto sells the cattle in the communities closest to his canton some 6 to 10 kilometers in distance which he travels with a vehicle his client owns. He uses it to transport the animals he buys. The client leaves at 5 am and returns at 12 noon.

The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy a recently calved cow and to clean up his pastures, to improve them for his cattle and provide safe conditions for them. This loan will permit him to generate higher income as he will have more milk production to sell which will allow him to pay for the household expenses and to pay off the loan to the Institute. He wants to grow economically so he can keep his animals in good conditions and this will produce greater profits to get his family ahead and provide the schooling for his daughter for the next year.

loans.use: to buy a cow who has just given birth and clean his pastures.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es una persona que se esta esforzando por ser un profesional exitoso, para que el día de mañana pueda ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su profesión. Comenta que gracias a su préstamo anterior pudo pagar sus clases y sus cuotas, lo que le ayudó mucho.
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando. agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is putting in the effort in order to be a successful professional so that he one day he can help others through his work. He tells us that, thanks to his previous loan, he was able to pay for his classes and tuition fees, which helped him greatly.

Today Arnaldo is applying for this new loan in order to pay tuition fees and continue studying. He is grateful for this new opportunity to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en:
Abel is a 55-year-old married man blessed with four children.  Ann, his spouse, brings in additional income to support their family. Abel  has been a farmer  for five years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000.

Abel is now borrowing his fifth loan of KES 50,000 from VisionFund Kenya and intends to use this amount to buy a dairy cow.  

He plans to use the anticipated income to boost his wife's business and hopes to upgrade the living standard of his family by building a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es una joven muy sacrificada, al terminar el colegio tuvo que trabajar, y ahora tiene la oportunidad de poder seguir sus estudios.
Está estudiando la carrera de licenciatura en farmacia, y comenta que sus metas son ser una buena profesional, para tener una vida mejor, y de poder ayudarles a las personas que necesiten y también a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda y podrá seguir luchando por cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Maria is a very selfless young woman. When she left school she had to work, and now she has an opportunity to continue with her education. She is studying a degree course in pharmacy, and says her goals are to be a respected professional, to have a better life and to be able to help people in need as well as her family.

She is asking for this loan to pay her university fees. This will be a great help to her and she will be able to continue working hard to reach her objectives.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en: Joan is a mother of two children who describes herself as enthusiastic. For five years, she has been operating a retail business selling vegetables and fruits. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenge as a lack of funds. She will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) loan to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables. She hopes that in the future, she will have a successful business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Luz Margarita

texts.es:
Luz Margarita tiene 68 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Oyotun, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a curaciones y prótesis, desde hace varios años, su consultorio se encuentra ubicad en su domicilio, es conocida en su distrito dado que no existe competencia en el rubro.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de material para curaciones de dientes.
texts.en:
Luz Margarita is 68 years old. She is single and lives in a house that she owns in the Oyotún district of the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast. Here the people make a living in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

Luz herself has been making a living putting in fillings and making false teeth for a number of years. Her dental clinic is in her home, and Luz is known in the local area as there is no other competition in the area.

Luz has applied for a loan of 1000 Nuevo Soles from "Edpyme Alternativa" in order to buy materials for putting in fillings.

loans.use: to buy materials for putting in fillings.

loans.name: Leidi

texts.es:
Leidi tiene 27 años de edad, vive con su conyugue y sus dos menores hijos de 10 y 5 años el cual el primero cursa primaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucara, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella tiene una bodeguita donde ofrece venta de abarrotes en general, las compras lo realiza en el Distrito de Pucara, para luego trasladar su mercadería en una mototaxi hasta su caserío donde su negocio se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Leidi is 27 years old. She lives with her partner and her two young children aged 10 and 5. The older one goes to primary school at the national school of the Pucara district, which is situated in the province of Jaén belonging to the Cajamarca region in the northern sierra of Peru. The locals work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Leidi has a small shop where she sells general groceries. She buys the goods in the Pucara district and transports them by mototaxi to her hamlet, where her business is located in her home.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy a variety of products so she can grow her business and generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to grow her business.

loans.name: Reina

texts.es:
Reina tiene 59 años de edad, vive junto con su conviviente, en casa propia, en el distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, desde hace varios años, junto con su esposo traen el alimento de los caserios aledaños como pasto y granos naturales.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alterntiva de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales cuyes, patos, gallinas para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mayor precio.
texts.en:
Reina is 59 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her partner. Reina and her partner live in the Oyotún district in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast. Here the people make a living in farming, cattle-raising and trade.

Reina has been making a living raising and selling farm animals for a number of years. Together with her husband Reina brings feed - such as natural grains and grass - from neighbouring villages.

Reina has applied for a loan of 1000 Nuevo Soles from "Edpyme Alternativa" in order to buy a larger quantity of animals (such as guinea pigs, ducks and hens) in order to fatten them up and sell for a greater price.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals (such as guinea pigs, ducks and hens) in order to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 65 años de edad, vive junto con su conviviente, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Zaña y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la costura y confección de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, desde hace varios años, cuenta con una maquiña de cocer que esta ubicada en su domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de telas, hilos para la confección de prendas de vestir que le permitirán brindar un mayor servicio.
texts.en:
Francisca is 65 years old and lives with her husband in a large community in the urban area of Zaña, situated in the province of Chiclayo which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. She has good work and personal references from her neighbours. The locals work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

For several years Francisca has made a living making and sewing clothing for men, women and children. She has a sewing machine in her home. 

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy a larger quantity of fabric and thread for making garments, which will enable her to provide a better service.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fabric and thread for making clothing.

loans.name: Immaculate

texts.en: Immaculate lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is a widow with five children, three in school. She has no additional family members. She sells beer and operates her business on a retail basis seven days a week. She has been in this business for the last eight months. She has requested a loan of 300,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy more crates of  beer. Her major challenges include transportation. Her goal and aspiration is to make her business prosper. She owns her own house but the family has no access to electricity or piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy more crates of beer.

loans.name: Guandugloma  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Guandugloma está formado por 7 personas luchadoras que a pesar de las adversidades miran la vida de una manera positiva, ellas con su trabajo mejoran  la economía de sus  hogares. Viven en el cantón Nabón lugar que se encuentra ubicado al sur-este de la provincia del Azuay, es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad, mantienen la gastronomía, cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Esther, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 12, 9 y 4 años de edad, todos sus hijos s estudian en una escuelita de la localidad, su esposo labora en el área de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que vive es  propia.
Doña Esther se dedica a los quehaceres de su casa, labora en la agricultura y sus cosechas las vende en la ciudad, cría cuyes, pollos y cerdos, también se dedica a la atención de su tienda en la que trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario. Su nuevo crédito va a ser invertido en víveres para su tienda y abono para sus cultivos. Su meta es agrandar su tienda y tener más producción agrícola.
texts.en:
The Guandugloma credit group is formed of 7 determined people who, despite adversities, see life in a positive way. With their work, they improve the economy of their homes. They live in the canton of Nabón, a place located in the southeast of the province of Azuay. It is a cold climate; the people work raising animals, in agriculture, and many do day work in the city. They keep the cuisine, culture and traditions of their people. 

One of the members is Esther, 28 years old. She is married and from this marriage she has had 3 children, 12, 9 and 4 years old. All the children study at the small local school, her husband works in the area as a construction assistant, and they live in their own home. 

Esther takes care of the household duties, and works in agriculture. She sells her harvest in the city, she raises guinea pigs, chickens and pigs, and also serves in her store, in which she works every day of the week without a set schedule. Her new loan will be invested in supplies for her store and fertilizer for her fields. Her goal is to grow her store and have more agriculture production.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Rosset

texts.en: Living in a rural area located in Kampong Cham Province’s Ou Reang Ov district, Enn Ty, 24, has one son. Enn Ty and her husband are rice farmers who have been farming for six years to make a living and working for others for fees. Enn Ty is new with VisionFund for this cycle. She is going to use part of her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and part to pay for plowing the field. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her rice in a healthy way, and she also hopes to harvest more rice to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more bags of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Mitchel

texts.en:
Mitchel is an enterprising woman in her community dedicated to her husband and her two children. She works daily in her field of providing manicure and pedicure services to support her family and provide a good future for her children. She learned her skills alongside her mother.

Mitchel alternates this work with a job preparing made to order leche flan (custard) to sell and obtain more income. She wishes to improve her business. For this reason, she is applying for a loan to buy raw ingredients to prepare leche flan.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients to prepare leche flan (custard) to sell.

loans.name: Gladys Violeta

texts.es:
Gladys Violeta tiene 20 años de edad, vive en su propia casa en una comunidad tranquila en el distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, ropa interior y pequeño bazar librera, actividad que realiza desde hace mas de 05 años, teniendo experiencia en el negocio, cuenta con clientela de la zona por el buen servicio que brinda.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys Violeta is 20 years old and lives in her own house in a quiet community in the Buenos Aires district, situated in the province of Morropon which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The locals work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Gladys Violeta makes a living selling groceries, underwear and a small stationery store. She has been doing this for more then 5 years and has experience in the business. She has customers from the local area because of the good service she provides.

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of products to offer her customers so she can generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a range of products to offer to her customers.

loans.name: Govida

texts.en: Govida is a 48-year-old married woman. She has four children. She describes as a good person. She operates a retail business, where she sells maize flour, wheat flour, juices, sugar and other household items. She has been engaged in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a good area, and her primary customers are members of the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge as a lack of funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more flour, sugar, bread, cooking oil and other items. Her business goal is to be financially stable within five years.

loans.use: to buy more flour, sugar,bread, cooking oil and other items to sell.

loans.name: Linda Group

texts.fr: Agée de 49 ans, Madame M'Baganda est présidente du groupe de crédit Linda. Mariée à un chômeur, elle exerce ses activités de vente de friperie il ya 5 ans pour nourrir et supporter ses 9 enfants qui étudient. Le prêt qu’elle sollicite lui permettra d’acheter 3 ballots de friperie afin de devenir un grand fournisseur de la place. A cet effet, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien qu’elle apporte aux femmes pauvres économiquement actives.
texts.en:
Mrs. M'Baganda is 49 years old and  is the president of the Linda loan group. Married to an unemployed person, she has been selling second-hand clothing over the past five years to feed and support her nine children, all of whom attend school. 

The loan she is requesting will enable her to buy three bales of second-hand clothing so that she may become a major local supplier.

To this end, she thanks Hekima for its support to impoverished, but economically-active women.

loans.use: buy three bales of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Amani Group

texts.fr: Je m’appelle Mutalengwa, présidente du groupe de crédit Amani, je suis âgée de 55 ans.  Je suis mariée et mère de 12 enfants qui étudient et j'ai comme activité la vente de friperie depuis 1980 sous l’initiative de mon mari. Le prêt que je viens de solliciter me permettra d’acheter 5 ballots de friperie afin d’épargner, d’agrandir mon entreprise et construire une maison. Pour cela, je remercie Hekima pour son soutien.
texts.en:
My name is Mutalengwa, president of the Amani loan group. I am 55 years old, married and the mother of 12 children who study.

Since 1980 I have been running a business selling second-hand clothing, following my husband's initiative.

The loan I just requested will enable me to buy five bales of second-hand clothing, so that I can save, expand my business and build a house.

For this, I thank Hekima for its support.

loans.use: buy five bales of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en: Marissa is 52-year-old married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marissa has a fish business in the Philippines. Marissa applied for a PHP 17,000 loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. in order to buy more fish to sell in her food stall. Marissa has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Marissa would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Enn Ty's Group

texts.en: Living in a rural area located in Kampong Cham Province’s Ou Reang Ov district, Enn Ty, 24, has one son. Enn Ty and her husband are rice farmers who have been farming for six years to make a living and working for others for fees. Enn Ty is new with VisionFund for this cycle. She is going to use part of her portion to buy fertilizer for her farmland and part to pay for plowing the field. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow her rice in a healthy way, and she also hopes to harvest more rice to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Donara

texts.en: Donara lives in Voxji village, in the Shirak region, with her son, daughter-in-law, and two little grandchildren. Donara has a farm, which was improved through the use of her first loan to add twenty sheep to the fifteen sheep that she had before. Donara's occupation is still cattle breeding, and her farm is very well-known around Voxji village. Sheep breeding gives her an opportunity to sell some meat and some cheese that she makes herself, which brings some income to her family, but not a lot. It is obvious that the financial needs of this family are significant, and Donara tries to meet them somehow. Donara is applying for a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase four calves, forage for her piglets and fertilizer for her land. She will be very grateful to lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy four calves, forage for her piglets and fertilizer for her land.

loans.name: Reap's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of the Battambang province, Reap is 42 years old and single. To make a living, she has been farming rice for 11 years. The current business earns her about 47,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Reap has been a member of Kiva’s partner VisionFund for three cycles already, and she successfully used the past loans to better support her living and provision of sufficient food. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, Reap is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow her rice in a timely way so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Khim's Group

texts.en:
Khim is a 37-year-old married mother of six children. She is originally from a rural village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. Three of her children are dependent on her and still in school. Rice farming has been the main source of her family’s income for 11 years. She and her husband  earn about 44,000 KHR per day to meet their family’s needs and manage to save about 30,000 KHR each day for future needs. 
Khim’s group consists of three members who have been with VisionFund for previous loans they completely repaid. The loans have helped Khim better support her family members. Khim, as the group leader, wants to use her portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farmland and use a portion of it to pay for labor. With this loan, she hopes to grow her rice fruitfully and healthily and also hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rice seed for her farmland

loans.name: Teang's Group

texts.en:
Teang is 49 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Bovel district of Battambang province. She has three children, two of whom are dependents and still in school. Rice farming and corn growing are the primary sources of her family’s income. She has been in this business for 17 years. With the current business, she can earn approximately 70,000 KHR per day and save about 50,000 KHR each day for future needs. 
This is the fourth micro loan for Teang’s group of two with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now leading her group to apply for a new loan, Teang will use her portion to buy rice seed and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to increase her current business to earn more income to improve her family's standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy rice seed and fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Karin Nehariyen

texts.es:
Karin Nehariyen tiene 36 años de edad, vive con su conyugue y sus dos menores hijos de 16 y 7 años de edad de los cuales el primero cursa secundaria y el otro primaria en colegio nacional del distrito de Pucara, una zona de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo de diversas líneas, su clientela en la mayoría son mujeres que compran cosméticos, cremas de belleza y perfumes, también vende productos para bebes. Karin es una madre emprendedora y muy alegre que esfuerza mucho para contribuir con los gastos familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes, así también tener en stock para promocionarlo mediante una vitrina que tiene en su domicilio.
texts.en:
Karin Nehariyen is 36 years old, lives with her partner and her to minor children, 16 and 7 years old, the first of whom is in the first year of secondary school and the the other is in the primary school in the national school of the district of Pucara, a zone with a warm climate. Its people work in agriculture, commerce, and raise livestock. It is located in the province of Jaén, which is part of the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú. 

She works selling beauty products from various catalogs. The majority of her customers are women who purchase cosmetics, beauty creams and perfumes, and she also sells baby products. Karin is an enterprising mother and is very happy that she puts a lot of effort into contributing to the family expenses.  

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to purchase a greater quantity of products to offer to her customers, and in that way advertise them in the display case she has in her home.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of products to offer to her customers.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman who owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.
 
For the past four years Mariam has operated a tailoring business that makes women's and men suits. With this Kshs 30,000 loan, she wants to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business. 

Miriam decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business.  She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials and sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is 26 years old, married to Robai and they have been blessed with a 1-year-old child. He runs a motorcycle transport business but has a secondary business of poultry farming. He is able to earn a monthly income of 18,000 KES from the two businesses.

Peter just joined VisionFund Kenya and has applied for his first loan which he plans to use to buy some growers mash, layers mash as well as some poultry vaccination. He hopes to use the anticipated profits to improve his family's status as well as repay the loan.

In the future, he would like to be able to support his family well.

loans.use: To support his poultry business by buying feed and medicine.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es: Es una mujer luchadora, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, tiene 48 años de edad, casada con 8 hijos: De los cuales 6 son mayores de edad y 2 adolescentes que estudian su secundaria. Con el objetivo de tener su propia fuente de ingresos, desde hace 4 años estableció su negocio de venta de ropa usada en su vivienda. Gracias a los  financiamientos anteriores brindados por PANA PANA, le han permitido ampliar su negocio y diversificar sus productos, actualmente ha establecido una pequeña tienda de ropa nueva en un tramo que alquila en el mercado municipal. Solicita su tercer financiamiento para comprar en Managua: Una paca de ropa mixta, blusas, pantalones, faldas, ropa interior nueva y venderla a precio accesible en Puerto Cabezas. Su sueño es poner una boutique, con maniquí, para ofertar mejor sus productos.
texts.en: She is a determined woman, from Puerto Cabezas. She is 48 years old, married, with 8 children, of whom 6 are adults and 2 are teenagers who are secondary school students. With the objective to have her own source of income, for the past 4 years she has had a business selling used clothing in her home. Thanks to the previous loans offered by PANA PANA, which have permitted her to expand her business and diversify her products, she currently has established a small store of new clothing in a space she rents at the city market.  She asks for her third loan to purchase a bundle of new mixed clothing, blouses, pants, skirts, and underwear and sell them at a reasonable price in Puerto Cabezas. Her dream is to have a boutique, with a mannequin, to offer her products in a better way.

loans.use: to purchase a bundle of new mixed clothing, blouses, pants, skirts, and underwear in Managua.

loans.name: Kim Srey's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Ou Reang Ov district, Kim Srey is a 34-year-old married mother of one. She and her husband have earned a living through farming rice for 16 years. To better support the family, she works for others for a fee. The current business earns her about 28,000KHR per day, out of which she manages to save about 10,000KHR daily for future needs. 

Now leading her group to apply for a loan, Kim Srey will use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her current business and make more income to improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Somoul

texts.en:
Somoul is 34 years old and married with four children. She is a citizen from the rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Dambae district. To make a living and support the family, she and her husband have been farming rice and growing cassava as primary businesses for 16 years. 
This is the third micro loan for Somoul with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. Now she is asking for a new loan to buy pesticides and fertilizers for her cultivated land and to use a portion of the loan on labor fees. With this loan, she hopes to cultivate her rice to earn more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is a 21-year-old unmarried man with a child. He operates a motorcycle transport business. In addition, Emmanuel runs a hotel where he cooks food like cakes, which he sells to customers and also supermarkets in his area. He has been making a monthly income of 20,000 Kenya shillings (KES) per month.

Emmanuel just joined VisionFund Kenya and has applied for his first loan, which he plans to use to purchase ingredients like flour, cooking oil, salt and sugar. He hopes to use the anticipated profits to save toward the education of his child as well as to feed his family and repay his loan.

In the future, he would like to build a better environment for his family.

loans.use: to expand his hotel business by increasing his inventory of foodstuffs

loans.name: Luis Angel

texts.es:
Luis Ángel tiene 37 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de reparación de zapatos, es conocido en su distrito por la actividad que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales para la reparación de zapatos, sandalias entre otros y de esta manera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Luis Ángel is 37 years old, married in a civil union, and lives in the district of Cayaltí, a quiet community, whose population works in agriculture, business and raising livestock, located in the province of Chiclayo which belonts to the region of Lambayeque, on the north coast of Perú.

He works offering shoe repair services, and is known in his district for what he does. He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to purchase materials to repair shoes and sandals among others, and in this way offer better service to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase materials to repair shoes and sandals among others.

loans.name: Marìa Elsa

texts.es:
María Elsa tiene 66 años de edad, vive con su esposo, en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayalti y cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia e Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de periódicos y revistas desde hace varios años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de revistas y periódicos de diversas líneas que le permitan ofrece variedad a sus clientes y generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Elsa is 66 years old, lives with her husband in a large community in the urban zone of Cayalti, and has good personal and work references from her neighbors. The population works in agriculture, business, and raising livestock and is located in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Perú. 

She has worked selling newspapers and magazines for a number of years, and has asked for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase a greater quantity of a variety of magazines and newspapers which will allow her to offer variety to her customers and create greater income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a larger quantity of a variety of magazines and newspapers which will allow her to offer variety to her customers.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys is a married woman with six children. She describes herself as patient. She operates a food stall where she cooks mandazi (East African doughnuts) and chapati (flatbread) to sell. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are the general public. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more ingredients for preparing food she sells. Her business goal is to be financially stable within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful.

loans.use: buy more ingredients for preparing food she sells

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina tiene 53 años de edad, vive con sus hijos, en una comunidad pequeña en la zona rural de Cayaltí , cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno y venta de animales menores como carneros, pavos, patos y cuyes, su negocio se encuentra ubicada en la parte posterior a su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 501 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales que le permitan engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Catalina is 53 years old and lives with her children in a small community in the rural zone of Cayaltí. She has good personal and work references from her neighbors. The population works in agriculture, business and animal husbandry. It is located in the province of Chiclayo which is part of the Lambayeque region, on the north cost of Perú. 

She works raising cattle and selling smaller animals such as rams, turkeys, ducks and guinea pigs. Her business is located in the back part of her home. She has asked for a loan of 2,501 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase a greater quantity of animals that will permit her to fatten them and offer them for a better price.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of animals which will permit her to fatten them and sell them for a better price.

loans.name: Milagros Del Pilar

texts.es:
Milagros del Pilar tiene 20 años de edad, vive en el Caserío de Cascarrillo, una zona rural del Distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad de clima caluroso su población es amable se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, chica de jora y el “clarito helado”, una bebida típica de la Región Piura, también tiene sembrado plátano en la parte posterior a su domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de plátano y una segunda parte para la compra de cerveza para implementar su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Milagros del Pilar is 20 years old, lives in Caserío de Cascarrillo, a rural zone of the district of Buenos Aires, a community in a warm client whose friendly  population works in agriculture, business and animal husbandry, and is located in the province of Morropon which is part of the Piura region, on the north coast of Perú. 

She works selling beer, "chica de jora" (a traditional Peruvian drink made from corn), and clarito ice cream (a drink typical of the Piura region, also made from corn), and also has planted bananas in the back part of her home. 

She has asked for a loan of 3,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase fertilizer to maintain her banana crop and a second part to purchase beer to run her business and in this way generate greater income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase beer to run her business.

loans.name: Jose Celedonio

texts.es:
José Celedonio tiene 58 de edad, vive en su casa propia de material noble en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de sandias desde hace 4 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, cuenta con clientela considerable de la zona, el excesivo calor donde reside, José ha encontrado una oportunidad para vender también otras frutas jugosas que permitan saciar la sed de sus clientes.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de frutas que le permitan ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
José Celedonio is 58 years old, he lives in his own home of solid construction in the district of Morropon, a community based on agriculture, commerce and cattle ranching. Morropon is located in the province of the same name which belongs to the Piura region on the north coast of Peru.

José has been selling watermelons for four years. He works out of his house and has many customers in the area. Due to the excessive heat where he lives, José has discovered an opportunity to sell other juicy fruits as well, which quench the thirst of his customers.

He has asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 2,000 nuevos soles to buy a larger quantity of fruit to sell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fruit to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Len's Group

texts.en:
Len is 38 years old and married with five children. She lives in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Koh Sotin district. She and her husband earn a living growing eggplant, cucumber and chili peppers. They have been in business for 18 years. The current business earns them about 50,000 KHR per day and they manage to save about 30,000 KHR each day for future needs. 
Len’s group consists of herself and another woman who have been members of VisionFund for one previous loan. Len successfully used the first loan to better support her family and increase her family’s business. Now, she is leading her group to apply for another loan. As the leader, she wants to use her portion to buy rice seed and fertilizer for her plantation and use a portion of it to pay laborers. She hopes to grow her rice successfully and increase her current business to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds and fertilizers for her plantation

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Carlos

texts.en: Carlos is a Cameroonian who is 29 years old and has three children. The oldest is 6 and attends primary school while the youngest is 10 months old. He has been in the clothing business for over nine years which makes him very experienced and stable and his business successful. His business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will be used to increase his monthly turnover from 1,500,000 to 1,750,000 FCFA.

loans.use: to buy used clothing for resale

loans.name: La's Group

texts.en:
La, 44, is married with four children. She resides in a rural village of the Moung Russey district of the Battambang province. To support their family, she and her husband have been farming rice for 11 years. Together, they can earn about KHR 47,000 per day and can save about KHR 25,000 each day for their future needs. 

La has been with VisionFund for one cycle, and now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, La wants to use her portion to buy seeds and fertilizer for her cultivated land. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her paddy field.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for her cultivated land

loans.name: Uwezo Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kangindi est veuve et mère de 7 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle occupe la fonction de presidente dans le groupe de crédit Uwezo. Vendeuse d’articles divers, elle sollicite un prêt pour acheter 50 kg d’arachides, 50kg de riz et 50kg de sucre en vue d’approvisionner son alimentation.
