Son objectif pour l’avenir est de supporter les frais scolaires de ses enfants jusqu’au niveau supérieur. Elle remercie Hekima pour les activités en faveur des femmes démunies économiquement actives.
texts.en: Kangindi is a widowed mother of seven children, all of which are enrolled in school. She currently assumes the role of President within the Uwezo Group. A seller of various items, she is requesting a loan so she can purchase 50 kilos of peanuts, 50 kilos of rice and 50 kilos of sugar in order to stock her inventory. Her goal for the future is to support her children through higher education. She would like to thank Hekima for the work they do with impoverished working women.

loans.use: to purchase 50 kilos of peanuts, 50 kilos of rice and 50 kilos of sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
Angélica tiene 52 años de edad y vive en casa propia de material rustico junto a su conviviente, en El Caserío de Huancas, una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, es una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población es unida se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace 5 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos para cría que le permitirán tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Angélica is 52 years old and lives in her own rustic material house with her husband in El Caserío de Huancas. It is a rural zone in the district of Pucará with a hot climate and a united population who work in farming, business, and livestock. It is located in the province of Jaén that pertains to the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

She has worked raising and selling small animals for five years. Her business is located in the back part of her home. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 nuevos soles to buy pigs to raise. They will allow her to have more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Anselma

texts.es: Anselma: Es una señora amable y sonriente, originaria de Puerto Cabezas,  madre soltera de un adolescente que cursa su primaria. Con el objetivo de tener su propia casita de tambo de madera. Solicita financiamiento para comprar materiales de construcción: madera, zinc, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Su sueño es terminar la construcción de su vivienda y brindarle a su familia una vivienda con las condiciones adecuadas y apoyar al desarrollo profesional de su hijo.
texts.en: Anselma is a kind and smiling woman, a native of Puerto Cabezas. She is the single mom of a teenage boy who is in elementary school. With the goal of  having her own little stilt wooden house, she is requesting a loan to buy construction materials: wood, zinc, nails, and to pay for labor costs. Her dream is to finish her house and give her family a dwelling with the right conditions, and to support her son's professional development.

loans.use: to buy construction materials: wood, zinc, nails, and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: João

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Homoine Província De Inhambane tem 58 anos de idade vive maritalmente é pai de 6 filhos todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua sogra que vive em sua casa.
Trabalha no I.F.P a mais de 12 anos, aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da casa, com este empréstimo pretende adquirir material de  construção como chapas de zinco, barrotes e cimento. Sendo que este é o seu 7º empréstimo na hluvuku, os últimos  foram aplicados para mesma actividade.
Futuramente pretende adquirir algumas parcelas para a prática de agricultura, finalizar a sua obra para garantir o conforto da sua família.
texts.en:
João comes from Homoine, province of Inhambane. He's 58 years old and married. He has six children, all of whom attend school, and he supports his mother-in-law who lives with him.
He has worked for I.F.P. (a teacher training institute) for over 12 years and earns an income which he uses to pay for household expenses. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies such as zinc sheets, beams and cement. This is his 7th loan with Hluvuku, and the previous loans were used for the same purpose.
In the future he intends to acquire some plots of land for farming. He also intends to finish building his house in order to provide comfort for his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as zinc sheets, beams and cement.

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en: Nicholas is married, the father of one child and describes himself as optimistic. For the last four years, he has earned a living by selling utensils. His does his selling in a busy location and has many repeat customers. His biggest challenge is a lack of funds, which is why he is requesting a Kes. 20,000 loan to buy more utensils to sell. His goals for the future are to open a wholesale business, have a strong cash flow, and enjoy a good lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy more utensils to sell.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.pt: O Senhor Alberto  é casado ,tem 3 filhos e  todos  andam na escola. Ele  trabalha como motorista, seu salario não é suficiente para sustentar a familia e ainda custear as despesas da construção da sua moradia. Com o presente empréstimo ela vai compra cimento e loiça sanitaria para garantir o bem estar da familaardos ,o seu maior sonho é ver  concluido a formação academica dos seus filhos.o seu maior desafio é o custo elevado do material de construção.
texts.en: Carlos is married and has three children, all of whom are in school. He works as a driver. His salary is not enough to support his family and also pay for the cost of building his house. With the current loan he'll purchase cement and sanitary ware in order to ensure his family's well-being. His biggest dream is to see his children complete their education. His biggest challenge is how costly construction supplies are.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sanitary ware in order to ensure his family's well-being.

loans.name: Agatta

texts.en:
Agatta is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as being honest. 

Agatta operates a farm where she keeps poultry. She has been involved in this business for ten years. Her primary customers are of all kinds. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of capital. 

Agatta will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy farm inputs. Her business goal is to be successful within five years. She hopes that, in the future, she will be stable. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy crates of drinks to sell

loans.name: Pedro Miguel

texts.es:
Pedro Miguel tiene 54 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, junto con su conyugue y su hijo de 20 años el cual lo acompaña, residen en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de ollas, platos, plásticos en general, zapatillas y helados, su tienda es grande y variada, con la ayuda de su hijo se esfuerzan mucho en la labor que realizan, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro Miguel is 54 years old, lives in his own house made of rustic materials, with his partner and their 20-year-old son who is partnered. They reside in the Pucará district, a community that works in agriculture, business and animal husbandry, located in the Jaén province which is part of the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú.

He works selling pans, plates, general plasticwares, slippers, and ice cream. His store is large and varied; with the help of his son they put a lot of effort into the work they do. He has asked for a loan of 4,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase a greater quantity of products to offer his customers and, in this way, generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of products to offer his customers

loans.name: Justino

texts.pt:
Nasceu na Matola Província de Maputo tem 42 anos de idade, vive maritalmente é pai de 3 filhos dos quais 2 é que frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que vive na matola enviando lhe mesada. 
É segurança na empresa  trabalha a mais de 5 anos auferindo um valor mensal que aplica nas despesas da sua casa, com este empréstimo pretende adquirir material de construção como: janela e portas para a conclusão da sua obra. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na hluvuku sendo que todos foram aplicados na mesma actividade.
Futuramente pretende construir um muro de vedação na sua residência, e fazer capoeiras para a criação de frangos para a venda. O seu maior desafio é de garantir o ensino aos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Justino comes from Matola, province of Maputo. He's 42 years old and married. He has three children, two of whom attend school. Justino supports his mother who lives in Matola by sending her a monthly allowance.
He has worked as a security guard for a company for over five years, and he earns an income which he uses to pay for his household expenses. With this loan he intends to purchase construction supplies such as a window and doors so he can finish his construction work. This is his 4th loan with Hluvuku and all of the loans were used for the same purpose.
In the future he intends to build a fence wall around his house and set up coops in order to raise chickens for selling. His biggest challenge is providing his children with an education all the way to college.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies such as a window and doors so he can finish his construction work.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy dozens of cassettes and DVDs to sell

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar lives in the city of Sevan in the Gegharkunik region. She is married and has three children, two sons and a daughter. Her husband is unemployed. Gohar works at the bread factory as a baker. In this family, only Gohar and her elder son work (he is in construction), and it is very hard to sustain all of the family's needs. As Gohar says, they especially have hardships connected with the tuition fees of her smallest son. He studies at the at the paid division. 

Gohar really hopes that this loan will help her to pay her son’s tuition fee for the last semester on time. She hopes that this support from Kiva lenders will be the start of numerous deals in the future for her family with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay her son’s tuition fee for the last semester on time

loans.name: Rheuben

texts.en:
Rhueben is 47 year old and married with 4 children. He resides in Murang’a  which is a rural town situated near Nairobi in Kenya. Rhueben sells milk and crop produce from his farm to make a living. He has 12 years of experience in this business. From time to time, he engages in personal businesses to make extra money to satisfy his family’s needs.

Rhueben  is requesting a loan from Kiva lenders through Juhudi Kilimo to construct a piggery and purchase a water tank. He is diversifying from dairy and crop farming because of the changes in the market environment that have led to low sales and new opportunities.

Rheuben promises to use profits from these assets to satisfy his family’s needs, pay school fees and reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To construct a piggery and purchase a water tank

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
José Miguel tiene 27 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos los cuales son menores de edad, en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad de clima frío, su población se dedicada a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Junto con su esposa tienen una bodeguita donde ofrecen a la venta productos de primera necesidad, así como al comercio de ganado vacuno en la plaza de ganado de su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
José Miguel is 27 years old and lives with his spouse and their three underage children in the district of Callayuc. A community of cold climate, its population works in agriculture, business, and ranching, and is located in the province of Cutervo that belongs to the Cajamarca region, the northern range of Perú.

Together with his wife they have a small grocery store where they offer the sale of essential food products, and also sell beef in the meat market of their district. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 3,000 nuevos soles for the purchase of a variety of products to offer to their clients.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to offer to his clients.

loans.name: Victor

texts.en:
Hello Kiva Lenders! Meet Victor. He is a smallholder farmer in Nandi Hills who has been practicing mixed farming for 6 years. On his small farm he grows tea, passion fruits and greens. He also keeps dairy cattle and poultry. The father of 2 sells produce from his farm that include milk, eggs and tea into the local market. 
He enjoys looking after his dairy cows. His biggest challenge, however, is harvesting tea. 
Victor is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase improved farm implements.
The biggest problem affecting farmers’ productivity is the use of cheap, poorly manufactured tools. With your lending, victor will purchase improved farm tools and implements that are equipped for labor intensive work and have major sustainable impacts, including higher yields, higher income and more time for other activities. 
Profits from the improved implements will go to relieving other business related expenses. This loan will benefit Victor’s family by increasing Victors’ income.

loans.use: to purchase farm implements

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more slippers and shoes.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a lady in a small village in Nandi Hills, Kenya. She has been growing tea and food crops for 13 years. She also raises dairy cattle and poultry. This mother of 4 and the rest of her group members were inspired by the progress other farmers made by forming groups and joining Juhudi Kilimo. 
Judith is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders via Juhudi Kilimo to purchase a water tank. A water tank will enable her to collect rainwater for watering her plants and other domestic uses such as washing of clothes. The tank will also save her a lot of time and energy that she would otherwise spend going the spring. 
Judith plans to spend any increase in income that will arise from the water tank satisfying her family's needs and paying her children’s school fees. The tank will also store water in anticipation of drought, thus ensuring the animals and plants to have a constant supply of water.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of rice .

loans.name: Mousa

texts.en:
Mousa is a 26-year-old single man, living with his family in their own house in Hodeidah, Yemen. He studied until the elementary level, but he couldn't complete his studies. Mousa has spent many years as a driver of a rented bus. The amount that he earned from this business was very low and not enough to cover all the expenses of his family. 

He has sold all his mother's jewelry in order to begin his own business, purchasing a bus for transportation. This bus is Mousa's sole income source. He earns good profits from this business. Mousa is very active and dynamic man. He is a talented and respected professional man. He works 19 hour daily, Sunday to Sunday. He spends most of his time in this business. 

His bus is very old and doesn't work well. It needs repairs and maintenance. For this reason, Mousa is requesting a loan of  196,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase tires and spare parts for the bus.

Mousa looks forward to completing his studies in the university and becoming an employee in the public sector.

loans.use: to purchase tires and spare parts for his bus.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more stock for her stall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more clothing material for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fish.

loans.name: Babra

texts.en: Babra is 22 years old and lives in the Chikomba East District of Zimbabwe. She is a Learner Guide collaborating with schools in her community to improve young people’s well-being. Babra runs a poultry project selling broilers in her local community. She loves her project very much and would like to expand it. Babra is seeking a Kiva loan so that she can purchase more chicks, feed, and feeding troughs to keep her business growing. With her profits she hopes to improve her standard of living and create employment within her community.

loans.use: to purchase more chicks, feed, and feeding troughs to keep her business growing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her business by purchasing groceries in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pepper, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: Phathisani

texts.en:
Phathisani is a 26-year-old single mother of one. She lives in the Nkayi District of Zimbabwe where she earns an income by selling drinks, coffee creamers, cereals, cooking oil as well as sugar from her home. She wants to use the requested Kiva loan to order more groceries to sell to local customers. Phathisani plans to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil, soap, salt and flour in bulk at lower costs from wholesalers so that she will be able to increase her sales while still selling her items at a fair price. 
In the community she is a Learner Guide who volunteers her time to teach students life skills and is assists young girls to make wise decisions about life and school work through counseling sessions. With the profits she needs to expand her business so that she can employ others from her community and also to provide for her child and family.

loans.use: to order more groceries to sell to local customers

loans.name: Cintia

texts.es: Es originaria de Waspam, tiene 35 años de edad,  es casada, tiene 5 hijos, en edad escolar. Con el propósito de tener su propia fuente de ingreso, hace aproximadamente 10 años se trasladaron a Puerto Cabezas, para establecer una pequeña pulpería. Su esposo trabaja como buzo en los cayos miskitos y con el objetivo de tener otros ingresos hace un año, inicio a trabajar en la captura de camarones y caracoles, a través de nasas, para su comercialización en el municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Solicita financiamiento para reparar las herramientas de capturas de mariscos e incrementar la  comercialización. Su sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia una y apoyar al desarrollo profesional y humano de sus hijos.
texts.en: She is from Waspam, is 35 years old, married, and has 5 school-aged children.  With the goal to have her own source of income, approximately 10 years ago they moved to Puerto Cabezas to establish a small grocery store. Her husband works as a diver in the Miskito Cays and with the objective to have other sources of income, began to work harvesting prawns and conches with baskets, to sell them in the city of Puerto Cabezas. She asks for a loan to repair the tools to harvest shellfish and increase the sales. Her dream is to improve her family's quality of life and to support her children's professional and personal development.

loans.use: to repair the tools to harvest shellfish.

loans.name: Enkhbayar

texts.en: Mr.Enkhbayar is 25 years old and lives in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia, with his parents. He has been working as an engineer for three years. His parents are now retired, and he is the only one who works and cares about his family. He is requesting a loan of 2,000,000 MNT to buy a Japanese car to have a taxi service for local people after work, which will help to increase his family income.

loans.use: to buy a car and have a taxi service

loans.name: Sanjaapuntsag

texts.en:
Mr. Sanjaapuntsag is a 33-year-old taxi driver. He lives with his wife and two little children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running his taxi service for three years and already has had many customers. His wife stays at home, looking after the children and caring for the household. So, Mr. Sanjaapurev is the only person who provides for the family.

He is requesting a loan of 2,200,000 MNT to buy a new car because his old car isn't in good condition to use for a taxi service. If he buys a new car, his income will be more than it is now and he will be able to provide for his family even more while, at the same time, serve people in comfort.

loans.use: to buy a car and run a taxi service

loans.name: Gulguncha

texts.en:
Gulguncha is 31 years old. She is married and is bringing up a little child.

Gulguncha is a sewer. She has been busy with sewing for more than 8 years. Gulguncha sews national dresses for women.  She also makes embroidery on dresses. Thanks to good service, she has regular clients.

Gulguncha develops her business little by little. She is going to increase her working capital now. With this aim, she is asking for a loan of 4,000 somoni to buy fabrics and a sewing machine. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy sewing machine and fabrics

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in the village of Achanan in the Syunik region. He is 48 years old and he lives alone since he is divorced. Artur has perfect skills for furniture making, but at this moment he works as an electrician. As he says, he likes his second occupation more and he is just impatient after his work to return home and take care of his cute and nice farm. On his farm he has two cows and a calf. The most beautiful is his colorful vegetable garden, where he cultivates potatoes, tomatoes, cucumbers, beans and greens. These goods he sells to resellers at the city wholesale market.

Artur dreams of a farm richer with animals and he also wants to have a nice orchard. Now he wants to start increasing the number of his farm livestock and he will be happy to buy eight lambs for his farm with this loan amount.

loans.use: to buy eight lambs for his farm

loans.name: Hadjah

texts.en:
Hadjah lives in Uganda, Kampala.  She is married with three children, two of whom go to school.  She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity, but not to piped water.  Her monthly expenses include school fees and rent.  She has one additional family member (a brother). 

Hadjah has a restaurant and operates her business on retail basis, working six days a week.  She has been in this business for the last 3 years. 

She has requested for a loan of Ugandan shillings 300,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy food staff like bunches of green bananas, yams, cassava, rice and beef. Her major business challenges includes thieves and defaulters.  Her goal and aspirations are to own a fully stocked restaurant.

loans.use: To buy more food staff like bunches of green bananas, yams, cassava, rice and beef.

loans.name: María Dolores

texts.es:
La Señora. María es una socia amable y gentil que forma parte del grupo de crédito Las Gaviotas desde hace 10 años, grupo en el cual se siente como si estuviera en familia, ya que siempre se apoyan y tratan de salir en adelante. Vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Baños en Cuenca, parroquia que es la atracción debido a sus aguas termales, que han sido aprovechadas para la construcción de piscinas y centros hoteleros a los que acuden miles de turistas nacionales y extranjeros. Tiene bellos paisajes y lugares paradisíacos, su gente es cálida y de un corazón amable y gentil.
La Señora. María tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijas mayores de edad que están casadas y viven independientes, la casa en la que vive es propia. 
Doña María es una mujer luchadora que con su trabajo ha salido en adelante, se dedica a la cría de cuyes, pollos y cerdos, también a la agricultura que es para el consumo de su casa y también para la venta, pero a lo que más se dedica es al trabajo que aprendió de sus padres el cual es la elaboración de canastas. El dinero va a invertir en la compra de duda (fibra natural) para tejer las canastas y cerdos. Su meta es de tener más animales y crecer en este negocio.
texts.en: María is a kind and gentle member, who has been part of the Credit group Las Gaviotas for 10 years. She feels like this group is her family, since they support each other and try to move forward in life. She lives in the surroundings of the parish of Baños in Cuenca. This parish is a tourist attraction because of its thermal waters that have been used to build pools and hotel centers, which are visited by thousands of national and international tourists. It has beautiful landscapes and places like paradise. Its people are warm, with a gentle and kind heart. Maria is 48 years old. She is a single mother of 4 older daughters, who are married and live independently. She owns the house where she lives. María is a hardworking woman, who has moved forward in life thanks to her job. She works raising guinea pigs, chickens, pigs, and also works in agriculture for home consumption and for sale, too. Where she works more is in the job, that she learned from her parents, which is the production of baskets. She will invest the money buying "duda" (a natural fiber) to knit the baskets and in pigs. Her goal is to have more animals and to grow in this business.

loans.use: To buy "duda" (a natural fiber) and pigs.

loans.name: Jahongir

texts.ru: Джахонгиру 19 лет. Он молодой, красивый и умный человек. Он не женат и живет вместе с родителями. Он учится на 2 курсе Таджикского Экономического Института по специальности налогового дела. В дальнейшем хочет стать хорошим специалистом, но для этого он должен окончить университет. Если он не заплатит за учебу, то его исключат с университета. В этом году его родители не в состоянии оплатить за учебу. Джахонгир запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Jahongir is 19 years old. He is a young, handsome and smart man. He is not married and lives with his parents. 

Jahongir is in his second year at the Tajik Economic Institute, specializing in tax matters. In the future he would like to become an expert, but to do this he needs to finish university. If he doesn't pay his tuition, he will be expelled from the university. This year he parents do not have enough money to pay for tuition. 

Jahongir requests a loan to pay for tuition at the university. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for tuition at the university

loans.name: Ryvije

texts.en: Ryvije is 43 years old and married with 5 children. They live in a small village in Kosovo with her husband his family members. Most of the families there live in poor conditions, live in small homes with many family members and are involved in agriculture in order to make a living. Ryvije’s husband works in a flour factory and after his work hours and on his days off, he, together with Ryvije is involved in agricultural work. They have never been able to make enough money to support their family and complete renovations on their home in order to improve their living conditions. Therefore, Ryvije is requesting a loan in order to replace the windows of their home to provide better insulation and protection from the weather, as well as extra security. As they have not been able to complete this renovation on their own in the past, Ryvije is extremely grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders for their support.

loans.use: To replace the windows of their home to provide better insulation and protection from the weather

loans.name: Suhrobjon

texts.ru:
Сухробчон жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый парень в возрасте 26 лет. Он пока  еще не женат. Сухробчон живёт со своими родителями в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. И поэтому с юного возраста он помогал своему отцу зарабатывать деньги для их семьи. Его отец работал на поле, и Сухробчон помогал ему пасти скот. Тем самым он многому научился от своего отца и сейчас сам может вести это дело. 

В данное время он сам занимается животноводством. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Сейчас Сухробчон хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Сухробчон очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Suhrobjon is a cheerful and hardworking guy, 26 years old. He is not yet married. Suhrobjon lives with his parents in the countryside. He does not have a higher education because the family's financial situation made it impossible for him to study at the University. Thus, from a young age, he helped his father earn money for the family. His father worked in the field, and Suhrobjon helped him graze cattle. Thus, he learned the trade from his father and now he can run the business himself.  

Currently, he works in animal husbandry, in fattening and selling cattle. He makes a good income from this. Suhrobjon wants to increase the number of cattle he has in order to expand his business. He has, therefore, appealed to Arvand to get a loan to purchase of cattle. Suhrobjon is hoping for a positive result, and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Zhyldyz

texts.ru: Жылдыз 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Жылдыз среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 2000 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Жылдыз, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 4 дойные коровы, 2 лошади, 15 овец и 15 коз. Также  есть земельный надел мерою 4,32 ГА, где Жылдыз сеет пшеницу, клевер и ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет в среднем 10,000 сом (KGS). Жылдыз обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS) для закупки семян ячменя и ГСМ для проведения весенне-полевых работ. Жылдыз намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит  увеличить поголовье скота. Доходы от кредита она хочет направить на оплату за обучение детей и покупку дома для старшего сына.
texts.en: Zhyldyz is 47 years old, married, and, together with her husband, is raising 4 children.  Zhyldyz has a secondary education.  Zhyldyz's work in agriculture and animal husbandry, which began in 2000, serves as the primary source of income for her family.  Thanks to Zhyldyz's perseverance, dedication, and hard work, she now has 4 milk cows, 2 horses, 15 sheep, and 15 goats.  She also has 4.32 hectares of land, on which she grows wheat, clover, and barley.  Her average monthly income is 10,000 KGS.  Zhyldyz turned to the bank "Bai-Tushum" for a loan of 15,000 KGS to buy barley seeds and fuel for spring field work.  Zhyldyz hopes to get a good harvest, which will inevitably increase her family's capital.  With the income from her loan she hopes pay for her children's education and to buy a house for her eldest son.

loans.use: To buy barley seeds and fuel

loans.name: Zhana

texts.en:
Zhana is 33 years old and a married woman, from village Kvitiri. She lives with her husband and two children. There is a high unemployment rate in the region and Zhana is also temporarily unemployed. The family runs small agricultural activities and generates appropriate income. In particular, they cultivate greens seasonally and sell them to the local retailers. However, their business needs some investment to reach its goals and provide better income for covering the family's increased needs. 

Zhana requested a loan for expanding their agricultural business and making it adjustable for all seasons. She decided to build a greenhouse with the requested money and buy seed potatoes and cucumber seed also. These products will be more profitable for this hard-working couple and also they will get stable income through the greenhouse. 

Zhana relies on the goodwill of lenders and awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To build a greenhouse

loans.name: Zef

texts.en:
Zef (pictured) is married and has two children. He and his family live in a little town in central Albania with a population of approximately 25,000 people. The town was known as an "industrial town" under the Communist regime up until the collapse in the early 1990s. This was because there were various industrial plants operating in the area, including a large phosphate plant.  Medicinal plants that grow in this area are: sage, thyme, chamomile, tisane, mountain tea, poppy and althae folium.

Zef sells used shoes as his sole source of income to support his family. He is seeking a loan in the amount of 300,000 Albanian Lek (ALL), which will give him the opportunity to buy more used shoes to for re-sale purposes.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory of shoes for re-sale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and efficient cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean cooking energy from Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr:
En 2000, Yaovi  aujourd’hui  âgé de 39 ans ouvre  une boutique de produits alimentaires à Attiégou dans la ville de Lomé. Homme célibataire sans enfants, son goût du travail et son accueil font grandir sa  clientèle, et pour cela, il veut étendre  sa boutique en devenant grossiste plus tard.
Quatorze ans de travail lui font solliciter un premier crédit de 300000FCFA à ce jour, il souhaiterait développer son affaire  en achetant des produits alimentaires   et des divers. Yaovi , soucieux de son avenir se bat au quotidien pour s offrir le meilleur.
texts.en:
In 2000, Yaovi, who is now 39 years old, launched his grocery shop in Attiegou, a neighborhood in the city of Lomé. He is single, without children. Thanks to his dedication to his work and friendly welcome, his customer base keeps growing, and he would like to expand his store and eventually   become a wholesaler.

After 14 years of work, he is seeking his first loan of 300, 000 West African Franc to develop his business in stocking up on food products and miscellaneous items. Yaovi, worried about his future, works very hard to obtain a better life.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: La señora Graciela tiene 29 años, casada tiene tres hijos de las edades de 10, 8 y 4 años,  ella se dedica  a  la crianza de ganado lechero y a la elaboración y venta de quesos, ella vive en la localidad de Karapata, este préstamo es el  primero que tiene con la institución, la señora Graciela va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado lechero mejorado para tener una mejor producción de leche,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar la producción de leche y por ende mejorar la producción de quesos, la señora Graciela enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, la señora Graciela va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos y para compra de forraje para su ganado, la señora Graciela desea para su negocio crecer en la producción y venta de leche, Ella es una persona joven trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida de ella y de su familia.
texts.en:
Graciela is 29 years old, is married, and has three children ages 10, 8, and 4.  She makes a living raising dairy cattle and making and selling cheese.  She lives in the town of Karapata and this is her first loan.  Graciela is going to use the loan to buy a new, better dairy cow so that she can have better milk and cheese production. 

Graciela hopes to improve her business and quality of life in the future.  She will use her increased income to buy better feed for her livestock, and hopes to especially grow her production and sale of milk.

She is a hardworking and enterprising young woman with a lot of determination to move herself ahead so that she can improve the quality of life of both herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Las Amigas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las amigas, están en su ciclo número 11 del programa de comité de mujeres, cada una está haciendo su mejor esfuerzo por ayudar a sus familias por medio del esfuerzo conjunto.
Catalina es parte del grupo, además es la presidenta, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, y es por medio de este trabajo que ella lucha por poder ayudar a su familia para darles todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Catalina es pide este préstamo para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, enlatados y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas. Su sueño es poder tener mejores ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Hay personas extras en la foto, debido a que el grupo tiene 18 miembros, pero en este ciclo solo 15 personas solicitan el préstamo.
texts.en:
This women's group is called Las Amigas (The Friends). This women's communal bank is in its 11th loan cycle. Each one of them is making a big effort to help their families by means of their joint endeavour.

Catalina is a member of the group and is also its president. She sells basic commodities, and it is through this work that she fights to be able to help her family and give them everything she was not able to have herself.

Catalina is asking for this loan to buy items such as groceries, drinks and tinned goods. In this way she can continue with her selling. Her dream is to be able to earn more money to be able to help her family through her work. There are extra people in this photo because the group has 18 members, but this round only 15 members are requesting a loan.

loans.use: to buy items such as groceries, drinks and tinned goods.

loans.name: Raul Francisco

texts.es:
Raúl Francisco tiene 39 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires en su casa de propia junto con su esposa e hijo, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, sandalias, actividad que realiza hace 5 años, la misma que se encarga su cónyuge, el brinda servicios como obrero en carga de plátano.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos como arroz, aceite entre otros y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Raúl Francisco tiene 39 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Buenos Aires en su casa de propia junto con su esposa e hijo, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, sandalias, actividad que realiza hace 5 años, la misma que se encarga su cónyuge, el brinda servicios como obrero en carga de plátano.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos como arroz, aceite entre otros y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.

loans.use: Compra de variedad de productos como arroz, aceite entre otros.

loans.name: Taron

texts.en:
This young man’s name is Taron and he is 25 years old.  He lives with his mother in Vanadzor city in Lori region.  Taron is thankful for his first loan from Kiva with which he used to buy a washing machine to surprise his mother which was a really great gift.

Taron’s father is working abroad in the Russian Federation and his sister is married and she lives separately with her family. Taron has higher education and for several years he worked at an insurance company, then at a gas station as a shift head.  Now he works as a turner at a private company. 

Taron is very happy and excited to inform us that he is going to get married. He says he always dreamed of a nice and cheery wedding in accordance with our traditions and now that he has a beautiful bride his dream seems to be within reach and real for him.

He asks this loan in order to organize a beautiful wedding party for which not only he and his bride and impatient, but also his parents.

loans.use: to organize a beautiful wedding party

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna lives with her children in Artashat city in Ararat region.  Susanna’s husband died several years ago of an illness and since then she has taken care of her children alone.  She is proud of her children, since both of them are very clever and wise and they are very laborious. Her daughter is a student  studying to become a physiologist and her son is employed and works at a private workshop. Susanna  has a degree in education and worked as a school teacher for many years, but now she works at the food market as a saleswoman. 

Susanna asks for this loan in order to improve her children’s living conditions.  She plans on making repairs to their house. She wants to make their house cleaner, more comfortable and brighter.

loans.use: to improve her children’s living conditions by making repairs to their house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, chiles, cabbages, plantains, squash, pineapples, watermelons, apples, and jocotes.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge tiene 19 años de edad  y fabrica bloques artesanales de cemento desde hace 2 años, aprovechando que su padre tiene una ferretería y lo motivó a generar ingresos propios, mediante la apertura de una bloquera propia. Además del negocio de su padre hay otras ferretería que compran sus bloques y que son sus principales cleintes en el sector donde se encuentra ubicado. Su meta es mejorar la imagen de su negocio  y aumentar su calidad de vida. Para el crecimiento de su negocio tiene un gran desafio, que es el de lograr fuentes de financiación para invertir. Esta es justamente  la razón por la cual está aplicando a un crédikiva, mediante el cual compará, cemento y arena para aumentar su productividad y vender mucho mas, razón de éxito de su inversión.
texts.en:
Jorge is 19 years old and has been making handmade cement blocks for 2 years. Making the most of his father’s hardware store, it has motivated him to earn his own income by opening his own workshop making cinderblocks.  In addition to his father’s business there are other hardware stores who sell his cinderblocks and who are his main clients in the area where he is located. 

His goal is to improve the image of his business and increase his quality of life. To grow his business, he has a big challenge which is to secure sources of finance for investment. This is precisely the reason why he is requesting a loan from Kiva. With the loan he will purchase cement and sand to increase his productivity and sell much more.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand.

loans.name: Santos Emiliano

texts.es:
Santos, fortalecerá su negocio con la ayudo del capital que está solicitando, comprara 3 cerdos, concentrado, abono, semilla, fertilizantes, plaguicidas y herbicidas.  Cuidara bien de los cerdos para tener mejores ganancias al venderlos y continuara cultivando granos básicos.
Con  el préstamo anterior logro tener una cosecha muy abundante, sin problema de plagas y que le dejo mejores ganancias, con las que cambio el estilo de vida familiar de manera positiva, también ha hecho la apertura de una tienda en su vivienda, ofrece artículos de la canasta básica a los residentes de la zona donde vive.
texts.en:
Santos will build his business with the help of the money he is requesting. He will buy three pigs, pig feed, manure, seeds, fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides. He will take good care of the pigs so that he can make the highest profit when he sells them, and he will continue growing staple grains.

With his previous loan, he managed to have a very plentiful harvest. There were no pest issues, which left him a large profit, and this made his family's lifestyle more positive. He has also opened a store in his home, where he sells staple goods to residents who live in the area.

loans.use: to buy three pigs, pig feed, manure, seeds, fertilizer, pesticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cigarettes, drinks and biscuits to expand her business.

loans.name: Rodolphe

texts.en: Rodolpheis is 40 years old and lives in Cameroon with his wife and three children. His oldest child is ten years old and attends primary school while his youngest child is three and in a nursery school. He has been in his current line of work for more than ten years, which makes him very experienced, stable, and successful. His business is likely to continue to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. Rodolpheis will use this loan to increase his output and profits.

loans.use: to buy a new grinding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasoning, to expand her business.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is a 29-year-old single lady. She supports her younger brothers and sisters. She has been selling different retail items like basins, soaps, etc. for a period of five years and she makes a monthly income of 6,000 KES.

She has applied for her first loan which she plans to use to add more stock of basins, soaps and other items that are running low. She hopes to use the anticipated profits to repay her loan and also pay for the education of her sisters and brothers who depend on her.

In future she would like to start a family and live a comfortable life.

loans.use: to add more stock of basins, soaps and other items.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is married and the father of five children who lives in Ndaragwa, Kenya with his family. He has earned a living by farming for the last 20 years, and his main income sources are milk, eggs and various crops produced on his farm. He is requesting a loan to buy a dairy cow. Dairy is one of the most promising businesses in Kenya because returns are available to the farmer within one month. That is why Juhudi Kilimo is financing small farmers with assets like this that can generate income and guarantee payments. Today, very few other businesses can guarantee this quick a remittance. Peter will use the additional income he earns from his output of milk to pay for his childrens' education. He sees a brighter future for himself and his family and believes education sets the foundation for everything. Your loan will help Peter increase milk his production and income and provide his family with higher living standards.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more biscuits, cigarettes and chocolate to expand her business.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en: Hasmik lives with her husband in the city of Vanadzor, which is in her country's Lori region. They have a son who is a serviceman. The family’s only source of income is Hasmik’s business, which she has been in for the last 20 years and which is now located in the city's wholesale market. She has a large number of customers who regularly shop in her stall because she provides good service and low prices. She buys her goods in Yerevan with help from her husband. Hasmik has requested a loan for 600,000 Armenian drams to buy more sportswear and shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy sportswear and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Cashaloma  (Nabón) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Cashaloma está formado por 8 personas luchadoras que a pesar de las adversidades miran la vida de una manera positiva, con su trabajo mejoran  la economía de sus hogares. Viven por la parroquia de Nabón lugar que se encuentra ubicado al sur-este de la provincia del Azuay, es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, a la agricultura y muchos laboran diariamente en la ciudad, mantienen la gastronomía, cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora Rosa, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 17, 14, 12 y 10 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos en la escuela, su esposo labora a diario en el trabajo de la construcción como albañil, la casa en la que viven es propia. Doña Rosa se dedica a la agricultura, sus cosechas son para el consumo de su casa y también la para venta,  cría cuyes, cerdos y pollos,  también se dedica al bordado, esta actividad aprendió por habilidad y  trabaja desde su casa. El dinero de su crédito es para la compra de telas para sus bordados, semillas y alimento para sus animales. Su meta es tener más animales y de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
The loan group Cashaloma is made up of 8 hardworking people who despite adversity view life in a positive way. With their work they improve the economy of their homes. They live in the parish of Nabón, a place that is found located in the southeast of the province of Azuay. It has a cold climate, and its people work in the raising of animals, agriculture, and many work daily in the city. They maintain the gastronomy, culture, and traditions of their towns.

One of the members of this group is Señora Rosa. She is 35 years old, married, and as a result of that union has conceived four children of 17, 14, 12, and 10 years of age. Her first two children study at the high school and her latest children study at the school. Her husband works daily in construction as a builder, and the house that they live in is their own. Doña Rosa works in agriculture and her harvests are for the consumption of the household and also for sale. She raises guinea pigs, pigs, and chickens. She also does embroidery. She learned this activity by skill and she works from her home. The money from the loan is to buy fabric for her embroidery, seeds, and feed for her animals. Her goal is to have more animals and of better quality.

loans.use: to buy fabric, seeds, and feed for animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is 40 years old, married and the mother of four children who also cares for three other dependents because they are orphans. She is very hard working and runs a grocery store in a market where she has three stalls. She also supplements her earnings there by generating rental income. She has managed to pay school fees for her children and also provide for their other basic needs. Juliet is requesting a loan for 4,000,000 Ugandan shillings to buy more stock for her business. Her major challenge is limited capital which prevents her from meeting her clients' increasing demand. She hopes in the future to see all her children attend good schools and graduate from university.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials in order to do repairs  and renovate his house.

loans.name: Yessenia Bersely

texts.es:
Yessenia de veinte y ocho años de edad,  tiene un nivel académico de bachillerato y con una especialidad en cosmetología,  y realiza la actividad de comercio o distribución de productos para las diferentes salas de belleza en la ciudad, dicha actividad la ejerce desde hace 6 años; luego que ella fue propietaria de una sala de belleza, después uno de los proveedores le manifestó que él se retiraba de la zona y le propuso la oferta de surtir a los clientes que él tenia, es así como ella comenzó a conocer dicha labor y en la actualidad la conoce muy bien, vive junto a su hijo menor, su esposo quien se dedica a la venta de agua empacada en centros educativo de la zona del municipio.

Ella le ha dado mucha experiencia y conocimiento en la actividad que realiza, pero también tiene la visión de restablecer su nuevo local de salón de belleza, ya que en la zona donde reside no existe ningún servicio de esa naturaleza, con el apoyo de su hermana que está en conocimiento y practica de dicha actividad.
 
El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar productos de belleza y accesorios por catálogo y acero como cadenas, pulseras, anillos, aritos, etc. Dichos productos son para ampliación de su negocio en el que invertirá un promedio de $800  

Ella tiene como visión obtener un negocio que le permita llenar las necesidades de sus clientes como también que le sea rentable para la sostenibilidad de su familia para la mejora de calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yessenia is 28 years old and has a bachelor's degree with a specialty in cosmetology, and she works as a distributor of beauty products to beauty salons around the city. She has done this for 6 years. When she was a beauty salon owner, one of her own distributors let her know that he was retiring from the zone and proposed the idea that she supply his clients, and this is how she started in her job, which she now knows very well. she lives with her young son and her husband who sells bottled water in schools in the municipality.

She has invested a lot of experience and know-how into this activity, but she also has a vision to reestablish a new location for her beauty salon since the area where she resides does not have such services. She plans to do this with the help of her sister who is knowledgeable and experienced in this area.

The loan she requests from CREDICAMPO is for the purchase of beauty products and accessories by catalog and jewelry like chains, bracelets, rings, earrings, etc. Said products are to expand her business where she will invest an average of $800.
 
Her vision is to have a business that allows her to fulfill her clients' needs and that is also profitable to sustain her family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and accessories by catalog and jewelry like chains, bracelets, rings, earrings, etc. Said products are to expand her business in which she will invest an average of $800

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and versatile cooking energy using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for clean and thermally efficient cooking energy using Liquefied Petroleum Gas

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando es una persona muy estudiosa, que quiere salir adelante por medio de su sacrificio y estudio, comenta que por medio de su estudio quiere montar su propio estudio contable para poder trabajar. Su anterior préstamo lo uso en poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le fue de gran ayuda.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder pagar nuevamente sus cuotas, y así seguir luchando por su meta como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que esta recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Orlando is a very studious person who wants to get ahead by making sacrifices and studying. He states that with his studies he hopes to open his own accounting practice so he can work. He used his previous loan to pay for university fees, which was very helpful.

He is now asking for a new loan to pay for university fees again and thus be able to continue to fight to reach his goal, as he has been doing. He is grateful for this new opportunity he is receiving which will be of tremendous help.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Soraya Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Soraya tiene la edad de 43 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijas, las cuales una de ellas esta en primaria y la otra en secundaria. es una persona trabajadora, emprendedora, con espiritu de fe y superacion, y con sueños por cumplir a corto plazo. labora para la Alcaldia y se desempeña como Directora de Planificacion y Obras Publicas desde hace 16 años. El crédito lo utilizara para realizar mejoras a su vivienda (ampliacion de una habitacion).
texts.en: Soraya is 43 years old and married with two kids, one who is in primary and the other who is in secondary school.  She is a hard working entrepreneur with a spirit of faith. She works for the mayor and serves as the Director of Planning and Public Works for 16 years. The credit will be used to improve her life by purchasing materials to build onto her house.

loans.use: to buy materials for construction like bricks, cement, sand,  iron, and labor

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura es de la ciudad de Curuguaty, trabaja y  al mismo tiempo estudia, ella es funcionaria y de esa forma lucha por poder cubrir sus gastos de la universidad.
Está cursando el primer  año  de la carrera de Licenciatura en Contabilidad, y comenta que su sueño es poder tener su propio estudio, y de esa forma poder ayudar  a las personas que necesiten ayuda.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de manutención, con lo que podrá cubrir sus materiales y demás, y agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Laura is from the city of Curuguaty. She works as a civil employee and is also a student, and in this way she struggles to cover her university expenses.

Laura is in her first year of a degree in Accounting and states that her dream is to have her own accounting practice so that she can help the people who need it. She is asking for this loan to invest in her living expenses to cover her materials and other items. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving so she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay for living expenses, such as materials.

loans.name: Kariobangi Baptist Education Centre Group

texts.en:
This is a group of primary school teachers in a school in Nairobi within Kariobangi slum. They are in their early 30's and are all married with children.The group leader- Pamela Kisia- is a 33 yr old lady with 3 children aged between 8yrs and 17yrs old. She lives in Kariobangi south which is not very far from where she teaches.  All the group members use charcoal for cooking. With traditional cook stoves, there is a lot of Indoor Air Pollution (IAP)which leads to respiratory diseases and also there is a lot of charcoal consumption by the traditional stoves.

Currently on average each member spends USD1.3 on charcoal everyday. The loan will enable them purchase high efficient cook stoves- JIKOKOA that will save them up to 50% of their daily consumption on charcoal. These cook stoves also reduce smoke and carbon emissions from the charcoal thus creating a better and cleaner environment for their families.

The families will be able to save USD 0.65 daily from the reduced consumption on charcoal.  This translates to USD234 every year for at least 5 years (lifetime of the cook stove).  This money will be saved and used for other needs like paying for their children's school fees, paying rent and making their lives better.

loans.use: To purchase high energy efficient cookstove for home use

loans.name: Maridadi Women Group

texts.en:
This is a group of women who majorly have small businesses e.g selling food by the road side, selling electricals and plastic wares within Huruma, a Slum in Nairobi.  Alice the leader is a business lady who runs a roadside food stall. She is a mother of two children aged 24 and 16.  Her 24 year old son helps in running the business while the 16 year old is in his first year in secondary school.  The group members use charcoal for cooking. With traditional cook stoves, there is a lot of Indoor Air Pollution (IAP)which leads to respiratory diseases and also there is a lot of charcoal consumption by the traditional stoves.

Currently on average each member spends USD1.3 on charcoal everyday. The loan will enable them purchase high efficient cook stoves- ECO ZOOM that will save them up to 50% of their daily consumption on charcoal. These cook stoves also reduce smoke and carbon emissions from the charcoal thus creating a better and cleaner environment for their families.

The families will be able to save USD 0.65 daily from the reduced consumption on charcoal.  This translates to USD234 every year for at least 5 years (lifetime of the cook stove).  This money will be saved and used for other needs like paying for their children's school fees, paying rent and making their lives better.

loans.use: To pay for high efficient cook stove

loans.name: Clautude

texts.en:
Clautude is a Cameroonian who is 46 years old and married with seven children. Her oldest child is 25 and attends university, while the youngest is four years old and attends primary school. 

Claudtude has been in the food business for over fifteen years, which makes her very experienced and stable and her business successful. Her business is likely to succeed because it is located in an urban area with many potential customers. This loan will be used to increase her turnover from 450,000 to 600,000 Central African CFA francs (XAF).

loans.use: to buy raw food to cook and sell

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is a 65-year-old micro-entrepreneur from Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Coron is known for its beautiful beaches and it is a famous tourist spot in the Philippines. However, last November 2013, typhoon Haiyan hit and the place and many businesses were damaged.  Vilma is married to Blandino and they have children. Her business is recovering and is continuously growing. She continues to work to provide for her family.

Vilma operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages, piecemeal, to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Vilma is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Vilma hopes that her business will get bigger and she dreams to have a longer life, to spend more time with her grandchildren. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: José Secundino

texts.es:
José de 26 años de edad, no obtuvo estudios ya que sus padres no tenían las condiciones económicas necesarias para darle los estudios.  Actualmente está acompañado y es padre de  2 hijos de 4 y 3 años de edad quienes están al cuidado de ellos, su esposa se dedica al cuidado de los animales de la casa como aves y cerdos.

José se dedica a la prestación de servicio de corralero,  actividad que tiene 14 años de realizar esta  actividad, aprendió por iniciativa propia ya que de sus primeros 8 años de edad comenzó a trabajar apartando los terneros y pastándolos y actualmente se dedica a ordeño de 24 vacas de 3:00 AM – 6.00 AM Y de 10:00 AM – 11:30AM Ordeña 12 Vacas,  cuando tenía sus 9 años de edad él se acercaba a ver para aprender la actividad que realiza hoy en día.

El cliente invertirá el dinero en la compra de cerdos para engordar y luego venderlos a un mejor precio, ganancias que las invertirá comprando más cerdos.

Desea seguir aumentando la crianza de cerdos y también darles los estudios a sus 2 hijos para que aprendan a leer y escribir,  ya que él en su tiempo no la tuvo.
texts.en:
Jose is 26 years old and did not obtain an education because his parents did not have the necessary economic conditions to give him an education. Currently, he is in a common law marriage and is the father of 2 kids aged 4 and 3 years old who are in their care. His wife takes care of the animals at home including birds and pigs.

Jose is a ranch hand, which he has done for 14 years. He learned it by his own initiative. At 8 years old he started to work by setting apart calves and letting them out to pasture. He currently milks 24 cows from 3 am to 6 am, and from 10 am to 11:30 am he milks 12 cows. When he was 9 years old he would approach them to see and learn the activity he does today.

He will invest the money for the purchase of pigs to fatten and then sell at a better price. He will invest the earnings to buy more pigs.

He would like to keep expanding the pig rearing and also give his two kids an education to learn to read and write since he did not have one.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten and sell at a better price. He will invest any earnings to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Mapenzi Group

texts.fr: Il ya plusieurs années que Madame Naweza membre du groupe de crédit Mapenzi est vendeuse de la farine de soja au marché. Agée de 38 ans, elle est mariée  à un homme sans profession et ensemble ils ont 10 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle sollicite ce prêt pour acheter 3 sacs de 100 kg de farine de Soja. Les revenus de ce prêt lui permettra de construire une maison et supporter la scolarité de ses enfants. Ainsi, elle remercie Hekima de tout cœur  de son œuvre grandiose en faveur des femmes.
texts.en: Mrs. Naweza, who is a member of the credit group Mapenzi has been a soya flour vendor at the market for several years. She is 38 years old and married to a man who does not have a profession. They have 10 children who go to school. She requests this loan to buy three sacks of 100 kg of soya flour. The income from this loan will enable her to build a house and pay for her children's school fees. Therefore, she thanks Hekima from the bottom of her heart for their wonderful work in favour of women.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of 100 kg of soya flour.

loans.name: Baraka Women Group

texts.en:
This is a group of women who majorly have small businesses e.g selling food by the road side, selling electricals and plastic wares within Huruma, a Slum in Nairobi. The group leader- 39yr old Mary Wanjeri- is a mother of 2 chilren aged 17yrs and 18yrs. All the group members use charcoal for cooking. With traditional cook stoves, there is a lot of Indoor Air Pollution (IAP)which leads to respiratory diseases and also there is a lot of charcoal consumption by the traditional stoves.

This is a group of primary school teachers in a school in Nairobi within Kariobangi slum. They are in their late 20's and they all use charcoal for cooking. With traditional cook stoves, there is a lot of Indoor Air Pollution (IAP)which leads to respiratory diseases and also there is a lot of charcoal consumption by the traditional stoves.

Currently on average each member spends USD1.3 on charcoal everyday. The loan will enable them purchase high efficient cook stoves- JIKOKOA that will save them up to 50% of their daily consumption on charcoal. These cook stoves also reduce smoke and carbon emissions from the charcoal thus creating a better and cleaner environment for their families.

The families will be able to save USD 0.65 daily from the reduced consumption on charcoal.  This translates to USD234 every year for at least 5 years (lifetime of the cook stove).  This money will be saved and used for other needs like paying for their children's school fees, paying rent and making their lives better.

loans.use: to pay for a high energy efficient cook stove

loans.name: Emildo

texts.es:
Emildo es estudiante de la Carrera de Bioquímica está cursando el último año de la carrera y comenta que su meta es recibirse lo antes posibles para poder ejercer su futura carrera, ya que sabe que por medio de esta podrá ayudar a su familia.
Sus aspiraciones son recibirse, tener su propio ingreso y ayudar así a su familia que hacen todo lo posible para que no me falte nada y así pueda terminar sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus gastos de transporte, y de esa forma seguir estudiando y llegar a su meta que es recibirise.
texts.en:
Emildo is a Biochemistry student who is in his last year of the major. His goal is to graduate as soon as possible to be able to work in his future career, because he knows that this way he will be able to help his family. 
His wish is to graduate, have his own income, and to help his family who do everything possible for him to have everything he needs and to be able to finish studying. 
He is asking for this loan to be able to invest it by paying for his transportation costs and thus continue studying and accomplish his goal of graduating.

loans.use: to pay for transportation costs

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De Lambare Group

texts.es:
18 son las mujeres que integran este unido grupo, ellas se unieron con el propósito de capacitarse, y por medio del trabajo unido de todas poder ayudar a sus familias.
Se destaca la Sra. Luz, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que gracias a su esfuerzo ha ido mejorando su situación de pobreza. Ella comenta que está trabajando en la venta de comidas varias que hace y que ella misma sale a vender de manera ambulante por su barrio.
Este préstamo lo pretende usar en la compra de insumos varios para poder seguir haciendo sus comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, carne, pollo, y demás, y así poder seguir con sus ventas luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vidas y sus ingresos.
texts.en:
18 women are part of this united group; they came together with the purpose of preparing themselves and helping their families through their work. 

Sra. Luz stands out. In her last survey she appeared within the third level of poverty meaning that thanks to her efforts she improved her poverty situation. She works selling different types of foods that she prepares and sells on her own as a street vendor. 

She will use this loan to buy the necessary supplies to make her foods such as produce, condiments, beef, chicken, and whatever is necessary to continue her sales in order to keep fighting to improve her living conditions and income.

loans.use: buy produce, condiments, beef, chicken and other inputs to make food

loans.name: San Vicente Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Vicente está en su ciclo número 5 del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas también están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, con el cual podrán conocer la situación de cada una, y conforme a ello poder trabajar e ir superando la situación de pobreza de cada una.
Gladys es una de ellas, es una persona muy trabajadora que con gran esfuerzo está saliendo adelante, es entusiasta y tiene como meta poder mejorar la pequeña despensa que tiene. Comenta que ya se hizo de muy buena clientela, y que por eso pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con productos varios para la venta.
Quiere comprar verduras, frutas, carne, lácteos, bebidas y demás. Gladys está contenta por esta oportunidad que recibe de mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
The San Vicente Group is in its 5th cycle for the women’s committee program. They too are doing the survey to eliminate poverty. According to the results, one can learn about each of their situations and they can work towards improving their impoverished situation. 

Gladys is one of them. She is a very hardworking person who is enthusiastic, with great effort is moving forward, and has the goal to improve her small grocery store. 

She built a great clientele and asks for a loan to stock her business with the varied products she can sell.  She would like to buy vegetables, fruits, meat, dairy products, beverages and more.

Gladys is happy for the opportunity to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: buy vegetables, fruits, meat, dairy products, beverages, and what is needed to stock a grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do some repairs to the walls and roof of his house to make it safer.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente; vive en el Caserío de Laynas, una zona rural del distrito de La Matanza, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio cuenta con servicios básicos como son agua y luz, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la producción y venta de plátanos, actividad que realiza hace más de 04 años, contando con clientela fija, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de banano y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is 29 years old in a cohabiting marital status; he lives in Caserio de Laynas, a rural zone in the district of La Matanza, a place where the people work in agriculture, business, and livestock, and has basic services like water and electricity. It is located in the province of Morropon that is in the region of Piura on the north coast of Peru.

He works in the production and selling of bananas, with more than 4 years of experience. He has requested a loan of 3,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase fertilizer for the maintenance of his banana cultivation and in this way he will generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his banana harvest

loans.name: Kos Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mme S.MARIE représente le groupe KOS WENDE. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgé a 04ans. 02 vont à l’école.
Elle vend des condiments depuis  08ans. Mme s’approvisionne au marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter 05sacs de gombo sec e 03sacs de condiments frais.
Mme veut réinvestir ses  bénéfices dans son activité. Elle ambitionne agrandir le champ de son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. S. Marie is the leader of the Kos Wende group. She is married with three children. The oldest is 21 and the youngest four years old. Two of them go to school.
She has been selling condiments for eight years. Mrs. S. Marie buys her stock at her local market.
She would like to buy five sacks of dried okra and three sacks of fresh condiments.
Mrs. S. Marie would like to re-invest her profits in her business. She hopes to improve her family's living conditions and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of dried okra and three sacks of fresh condiments.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 64 años de edad, de estado civil casada, vive con su esposo y nieto en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Cayalti, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales de parte de sus vecinos, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en el interior del mercado de su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, 64, is married and lives with her husband and grandson in a large community in the urban area of Cayalti. She has good personal and professional references from her neighbors. The local populations works in agriculture, commerce, and livestock. The community is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Santos makes a living selling groceries. Her business is located inside a market in her district. She has applied for a loan of 2,000 Peruvian nuevo soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a variety of products to offer her clients. In this way, she will generate a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of products to offer to her clients.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
Esteban tiene 55 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, junto con su conyugue y su menor hijo de 9 años de edad el cual estudia en el colegio nacional del distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

EL se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de arroz, junto a su esposo se esfuerzan en la labor que realizan, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos y pago a jornaleros por el mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Esteban is 55 years old and lives with his wife and nine-year-old son in their own home made of basic materials.  His son attends a national state school in the District of Pomahuaca, a community that has a warm climate.  The residents engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding.  This area is located in Jaén Province in the region of Cajamarca, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.  

Esteban is a farmer who specifically grows rice.  He and his wife put a great amount of effort into their work.  Esteban is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 4,500 PEN so that he can buy compost and pay workers to maintain his rice crop.  This will help him to improve production so that he will have inventory to offer to his customers.

loans.use: to buy compost and pay workers to maintain his rice crop

loans.name: Hilda Lucia

texts.es:
La Sra. Hilda es una socia que se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el grupo de crédito Las Gaviotas, grupo en el cual se siente como si estuviera en familia, ya que siempre se apoyan y tratan de salir en adelante. Vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Baños en Cuenca, parroquia que es la atracción debido a sus aguas termales, que han sido aprovechadas para la construcción de piscinas y centros hoteleros a los que acuden miles de turistas nacionales y extranjeros. Tiene bellos paisajes y lugares paradisíacos, su gente es cálida y de un corazón amable y gentil.
La Señora. Hilda tiene  54 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos mayores de edad que son casados y viven  independientes, su esposo es de profesión chofer y presta sus servicios en su taxi, la casa en la que viven es propia. 
Doña Hilda se dedica a la venta de almuerzos y en la atención de su bar en donde vende comida rápida, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años y trabaja 6 días a la semana, también se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos. El dinero de su crédito es para la compra de un refrigerador. Su meta es salir adelante.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the group "Las Gaviotas" and is in her second loan cycle. Hilda feels at home with the group, because they always support each other and try to get ahead. She lives in the outskirts of the parish "Baños en Cuenca" whose main attraction are the hotsprings.
